SPEECH.SPEAKER: F O R Y O U R C O N S I D E R AT I O N
BEST ADAPTED SCREENPLAY
SPEECH.RECEIVER: F O R Y O U R C O N S I D E R AT I O N
SPEECH.LINE: Christopher Markus & Stephen McFeely AVENGERS: ENDGAME Adapted Screenplay Written by Christopher Markus and Stephen McFeely

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LILA BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: Why three?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CLINT BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: ‘Cause two’s not enough and four’s too much- LAURA BARTON (O.S.) You guys want mustard or mayo, or both? CLINT TURNS. IN THE FIELD BEHIND THEM, his wife, LAURA BARTON sets up a picnic as COOPER and NATHANIEL play soccer.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LILA BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: Who puts mayo on a hot dog?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CLINT BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: We’ll both have mustard, hon! (to Lila) Okay. Draw back, deep breath... She lets loose. THUD! HER ARROW HITS NEAR THE BULLS-EYE. CLINT BARTON (CONT'D) Good job, Hawkeye. Go get your arrow. LAURA BARTON (O.S.) Enough murder practice! Soup’s on!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CLINT BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: One sec, babe. Be right there! We’re gonna kill some hot dogs. We’re hungry. But when he turns back...LILA IS GONE. The bow and arrow lie at his feet. He stares. 2 CLINT BARTON (CONT'D) Lila? Babe, did you see Lila- He turns to his wife, BUT SHE’S GONE. So are the boys. The soccer ball rolls to a stop near the picnic blanket. NO ONE CAN BE SEEN FOR A HUNDRED YARDS IN ALL DIRECTIONS. CLINT BARTON (CONT'D) Guys? Guys, come on... Clint walks toward the field, dread growing. CLINT BARTON (CONT'D) Laura? Clint breaks into a panicked run. CLINT BARTON (CONT'D) LAURA! CLINT MELTS DOWN, SPINNING AROUND, FRANTIC...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: (offering his hand) Good sport. Have fun? Nebula studies his hand, confused. Finally she shakes.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: It was fun.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: This thing on? Hey, Ms. Potts. Pep. If you find this recording, don’t post it on social media. It’s going to be a real tearjerker.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Pep, I know I said no more surprises. But, I gotta say, I was really hoping to pull off one last one. But it looks like...well, you know what it looks like.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Don’t feel bad about this. I mean, actually, if you grovel for a couple weeks, and then move on with enormous guilt...I should probably lie down for a minute, rest my eyes. Please know, when I drift off, it will be like every day lately. I’m fine, totally fine. I’m going to dream about you. It’s always you. Tony switches the helmet off. TIME CUT: NEBULA finds TONY SPRAWLED ON THE FLOOR. TIME CUT: 4 5 Nebula helps Tony into Quill’s chair. Tony slumps, completely still. Nebula gives him his privacy. Move in on Tony’s face as...A LIGHT SLOWLY GROWS BRIGHTER. Soon, the entire flight deck glows as bright as a sun. Nebula appears from the galley, shading her eyes. Tony’s eyelids flutter. Finally, he opens them to see... CAPTAIN MARVEL (CAROL DANVERS) hovering in space.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: I couldn’t stop him.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Neither could we.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: I lost the kid.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: (unable to say it all) We...lost...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Is Pepper...? 5 6 JUST THEN, PEPPER POTTS THROWS HERSELF INTO TONY’S ARMS.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PEPPER POTTS
SPEECH.LINE: Stay here, you stay right here-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: I’m not going anywhere. NEARBY, NEBULA watches the sad humans. ROCKET SITS BESIDE HER, GRATEFUL. She rests a hand on his furry head.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: RHODEY
SPEECH.LINE: It’s been twenty-three days since Thanos came to Earth. TONY, weak, sits in a hi-tech wheelchair, IV dripping into his arm. He stares, taking in the loss: SAM WILSON. SECRETARY ROSS. SHARON CARTER. SCOTT LANG. HOPE VAN DYNE. HANK PYM. NICK FURY. At Fury, Carol bites back emotion.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: World governments are in pieces, as you can imagine. But the parts that still work are trying to take a census. It looks like he did what he said he was going to do. JANE FOSTER. ERIK SELVIG. WONG. DR. STRANGE. THE BARTON FAMILY. QUILL. DRAX. MANTIS. GROOT. PETER PARKER. Finally, Tony looks away. RHODEY turns it off. NATASHA (CONT'D) Thanos wiped out fifty percent of all the living creatures on Earth.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAROL DANVERS
SPEECH.LINE: Not just Earth.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: RHODEY
SPEECH.LINE: You sure about that? 6 7

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAROL DANVERS
SPEECH.LINE: You never have to ask me that.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Where is he now?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: We don’t know. He just opened a portal and walked through. Tony looks out to see...THOR on the patio.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: What’s his deal? ROCKET (O.S.) He’s pissed. Tony turns to see Rocket for the first time. ROCKET (CONT'D) He thinks he failed. Which, of course, he did. But there’s a lot of that going around, ain’t there?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Until this second, I literally thought you were a Build-a-Bear.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: We’ve been hunting Thanos for three weeks - deep space scans, satellites - we got nothing. Tony, you fought him-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Who told you that? I didn’t fight him, he wiped my face with a planet while a Bleecker Street magician gave away the store. There was no fight because he’s not beatable.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Did he give you anything to go on? Clues, coordinates- Tony stares, lost, barely acknowledging Steve.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: I saw this coming, few years back. Didn’t wanna believe. I thought I was dreaming... 7 8

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Tony, I need you to focus-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: And I needed you, as in past tense. That trumps what you need. It’s too late, buddy. You know what I need? Tony turns to everyone, slightly unstable. TONY (CONT'D) I need a shave and a burger, not a bowl of soup. (stands) And I believe I remember telling all of you, alive and otherwise, that we needed a suit of armor around the world, whether it impacted our precious freedoms or not-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: But that didn’t work out, did it?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: I said we’d lose, you said we’d “do that together, too.” Guess what, Cap, we lost, and you weren’t there. But that’s what we do, right? Our best work after the fact? We’re the “Avengers”, not the “Pre-vengers-”

SPEECH.SPEAKER: RHODEY
SPEECH.LINE: Tony, take it easy...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: I’ve got nothing for ya, Cap. No coordinates, no clues, no strategies, no options. Zero, zip, nada. No trust. (rips out RT) Here. You take this. You find him, you put this on, and hide. (drops to his knees) I’m fine! Tony COLLAPSES. Rhodey catches him. 8 9

SPEECH.SPEAKER: RHODEY
SPEECH.LINE: Bruce gave him a sedative. Should be out the rest of the day.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAROL DANVERS
SPEECH.LINE: (heading for the lab) Take care of him. When I come back, I’ll bring a bottle of Xorrian elixir.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Where are you going?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAROL DANVERS
SPEECH.LINE: To kill Thanos.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Hey, hey, hang on. We’re sort of a team here. Between you and me, morale’s a little fragile.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAROL DANVERS
SPEECH.LINE: Oh, I’m sorry. My fault. Carol sees Steve and Rhodey catch up. She claps her hands. CAROL DANVERS (CONT'D) All right, team! I’m going to go kill Thanos. Message me if you get any intel that can help. Otherwise, I’ll report back when he’s dead. Great work, everybody.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Look, we realize “up there’s” more your territory, but this is our fight, too.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: RHODEY
SPEECH.LINE: Do you even know where he is? 9 10

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAROL DANVERS
SPEECH.LINE: I know people who might- NEBULA (O.S.) Don’t bother. They all turn to see NEBULA in THE LIVING AREA DOORWAY. NEBULA (CONT'D) I can tell you where Thanos is.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: Thanos spent a long time trying to...perfect me. When he worked, he talked. About his Great Plan. Even disassembled, I wanted to please him. I’d ask, where would we go once his plan was complete? His answer was always the same: “To the Garden.”

SPEECH.SPEAKER: RHODEY
SPEECH.LINE: You’re saying Thanos had a retirement plan.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Where’s this garden? ROCKET brings up EARTH on A HOLO-MAP. A BRIGHT SURGE OF ENERGY ENVELOPS THE PLANET (EMANATING FROM WAKANDA).

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROCKET
SPEECH.LINE: When Thanos snapped his fingers, Earth become ground zero for a power surge of ridiculously cosmic proportions. No one’s seen anything like it. He shifts the map, crossing billions of light years, to...AN IDENTICAL SURGE ENVELOPING A MYSTERIOUS, ORANGE PLANET. ROCKET (CONT'D) Until two days ago.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: You’re saying he snapped his fingers again. Where? 10 11 Rocket zooms the holo-image toward a cluster of stars...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: Planet is unnamed, but inhabitable. Rich atmosphere, good soil-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: A garden.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BRUCE BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: Thanos is there. And he just used the stones. Steve eyes everyone. THOR FINALLY LOOKS UP. BRUCE BANNER (CONT'D) (thinking of himself) You know, we’d be going short- handed.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: RHODEY
SPEECH.LINE: Because he killed all our friends.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROCKET
SPEECH.LINE: Are we saying they’re dead? We’re using that word now?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: RHODEY
SPEECH.LINE: He’s still got the stones.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAROL DANVERS
SPEECH.LINE: So, we take them. And we use them to bring everybody back.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BRUCE BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: Just like that?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Yeah. Just like that. No one speaks. Finally...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: If there’s even the smallest chance we can undo this, then we owe it to everyone who’s not sitting here to try. Everyone looks around the room...AGREED.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BRUCE BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: If we do this...why would it end any differently than it did before? 11 12

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAROL DANVERS
SPEECH.LINE: Because before you didn’t have me.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: RHODEY
SPEECH.LINE: Hey, new girl. All of us in here are about that superhero life. Where’ve you been all this time?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAROL DANVERS
SPEECH.LINE: There’s a lot of people in the universe. And they didn’t all have you. THOR STANDS. He crosses to Carol and holds out his hand. STORMBREAKER WHIPS PAST HER HEAD, RUFFLING HER HAIR. Carol doesn’t flinch. Thor smiles.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: I like this one. Steve stares at the planet a long, deciding moment. Then...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Let’s go get that son of a bitch. SLAM TO: TITLE: “AVENGERS: ENDGAME”

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAROL DANVERS
SPEECH.LINE: Trust me. You get used to it. ROCKET looks around from the pilot’s chair.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROCKET
SPEECH.LINE: Okay, who here hasn’t been to space? STEVE, NATASHA, and RHODEY half-raise their hands. ROCKET (CONT'D) Oh, you’re gonna hate this.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: Approaching jump in three, two... STEVE’S FINGERS TIGHTEN on the arm rest as... 12 13

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAROL DANVERS
SPEECH.LINE: I’ll head down for recon. If I’m not back in fifteen, you’ll know I found him.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: This is going to work, Steve.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: I know it will. (beat) Because I don’t know what I’m going to do if it doesn’t. JUST THEN, CAROL FLIES UP TO THE OTHER SIDE OF THE GLASS. CAROL DANVERS (OVER COM) No satellites, no ships, no armies. No ground defenses of any kind. It’s just him.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: That’s enough. The Avengers exchange a look.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Where are they? Thanos doesn’t answer. CAROL PRESSES HIM TO HIS KNEES.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAROL DANVERS
SPEECH.LINE: Answer the question!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THANOS
SPEECH.LINE: The universe required correction. After that, the stones served no purpose beyond temptation.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BRUCE BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: You murdered trillions.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THANOS
SPEECH.LINE: You should be grateful.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Where are the stones?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THANOS
SPEECH.LINE: Gone. Reduced to atoms.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BRUCE BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: You used them two days ago!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THANOS
SPEECH.LINE: I used the stones to destroy the stones. It nearly killed me. But the work is done. It always will be. That lands, sickening. ROCKET SEARCHES, FRANTIC, NEAR TEARS.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROCKET
SPEECH.LINE: No...they can’t be gone... 14 15

SPEECH.SPEAKER: RHODEY
SPEECH.LINE: He’s lying.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: My father is many things. A liar is not one of them.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THANOS
SPEECH.LINE: Thank you, daughter. Perhaps I’ve treated you- SWOOSH. THOR’S AXE SEVERS THANOS’ HEAD FROM HIS BODY. IT HITS THE FLOOR, FOLLOWED BY THE THUD OF HIS HUGE FRAME.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROCKET
SPEECH.LINE: What did you do? Thor just stares, his long journey a failure.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: I went for the head. As Thor walks away, Steve looks at Thanos’ head on the ground. IT’S OVER. THEY LOST. FADE TO BLACK. OVER BLACK: “FIVE YEARS LATER.”

SPEECH.SPEAKER: GRIEVING MAN
SPEECH.LINE: So, I went on a date the other day.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: JIMMY
SPEECH.LINE: Good job, Bobby. Back in the game.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: GRIEVING MAN
SPEECH.LINE: Thank you, Jimmy. (to the group) First in five years. I sat there at dinner thinking, what are we even supposed to talk about? STEVE ROGERS, thinner, older, LISTENS INTENTLY.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: What did you talk about?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: GRIEVING MAN
SPEECH.LINE: Same old crap. How much things have changed. How much we miss the Mets. My job, his job. Then it got kind of quiet. He cried during the salads.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: OLDER MAN
SPEECH.LINE: What about you?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: GRIEVING MAN
SPEECH.LINE: I cried just before dessert. But I’m seeing him again tomorrow. So...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: That’s great. You’ve already done the hardest part. You took a jump, didn’t know where you’d come down. And that’s it, those little brave baby steps we’ve gotta take. To try to make us feel whole again, to find a purpose... (to everyone) I went into the ice right after I met the love of my life. Woke up seventy years later and...had to keep going. The group takes this in. 16 17 STEVE (CONT'D) The world’s been left in our hands. If we don’t do something with it...then Thanos might as well have killed all of us. People nod, but Steve seems unconvinced by his own words.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: Hello? He hears A CLACKING. A KID on a bicycle rides by, playing card wedged between his spokes. Scott waves him down. The kid stops. 17 18 SCOTT LANG (CONT'D) Hey. Kid. What happened here? The kid says nothing. He just stares at Scott with a haunted look. Then he stands on his pedal and keeps riding. CLACK-CLACK-CLACK-CLACK-CLACK-CLACK-CLACK...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: What? (realizing) Cassie...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: Cassie! Cassie! SOON, A TEEN GIRL opens the door, shocked. A very long beat.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CASSIE LANG
SPEECH.LINE: Dad?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: Peanut? Scott wraps his arms around CASSIE LANG (14), now five years older than when he last saw her. She hugs him, CRYING.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CASSIE LANG
SPEECH.LINE: I thought you were gone.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: I’m sorry. I’m back...I’m back...I’m back... 18 19

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: And? NEBULA (HOLO) It was an infectious garbage scow. ROCKET (HOLO) So thanks for the hot tip- CAROL DANVERS (HOLO) You were closer. ROCKET (HOLO) And now we smell like garbage-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: (to Okoye) You get a reading on those tremors? OKOYE (HOLO) Minor subduction in the African plate.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Do we have a visual? How are you handling it? OKOYE (HOLO) Nat. It was a mild earthquake. In the ocean. We handle it by not handling it. Natasha looks burdened. Rhodey steps in. 19 (MORE) 20 RHODEY (HOLO) I can have NASA redirect a satellite, do a sweep just to make sure.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Thanks. Carol, you’re still coming our way next month? CAROL DANVERS (HOLO) Not likely. ROCKET (HOLO) Getting another haircut? CAROL DANVERS (HOLO) Listen, fur-face, I’m covering a lot of territory out here. The things that have been happening on Earth have been happening everywhere else. On thousands of planets. You might not see me for a long time.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: All right. Everybody keep keeping their eyes open. This channel’s always active. Anything goes sideways, anyone makes trouble where they shouldn’t, it comes through me. They ad lib their goodbyes as they sign off, except Rhodey. NATASHA (CONT'D) What’s up? Where are you? RHODEY (HOLO) Mexico. Got some news.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Okay...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: RHODEY
SPEECH.LINE: Federalés found a room full of bodies outside Juarez. Cartel guys. Guns still in their pants.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Could be a rival hit-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: RHODEY
SPEECH.LINE: But it wasn’t. Same MO as Marseille. And Kiev. (MORE) 20 RHODEY (CONT'D) 21 (beat) It’s definitely Barton. She nods, grim, reluctantly accepting. RHODEY (CONT'D) What he’s done here...what he’s been doing...I got to tell you, part of me doesn’t want to find him. Natasha just stares a long beat.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Find out where’s he going next. Rhodey nods, signing off. Natasha sits there, THEN CRUMPLES. After a long beat... STEVE (O.S.) I’d offer to cook you dinner but you seem sad enough already. Natasha turns to see STEVE in the doorway.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Come by to do your laundry?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: And see a friend.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Your friend’s fine.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: She leave the house today?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Nothing out there I particularly want to see.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: I spotted a pod of whales coming over the bridge.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: (dubious) In the Hudson.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Fewer ships, cleaner water. Just saying, there’s still a world out there. RHODEY (CONT'D) 21 22

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: If you’re about to tell me to look on the bright side, I’m about to hit you with a peanut butter sandwich. Steve relents, LETTING DOWN HIS FACADE.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Sorry. Force of habit.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: I don’t know how you do it. Steve bites into the uneaten half of her sandwich.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: I guess I don’t know how not to.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Me, neither. After a long moment, Steve looks up at her, honest.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: I keep telling them, move on. Grow past it. And some of them actually do. But not us.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: If I move on, who does this?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Maybe it doesn’t need to be done. Natasha takes that in. Steve is thinking of giving up. She looks around at Avengers Compound.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: I used to have nothing. Then I got this. This job, this family. And I was better because of it. She chokes slightly, collecting herself. NATASHA (CONT'D) And even though they’re gone, I’m still trying to be...better.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: I think we both need to get a life.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: You first. 22 23 They stare at each other a long, melancholy moment. THEN, WE HEAR A PING. NATASHA SWIPES TO A CCTV DISPLAY: SCOTT LANG’S FACE FILLS A SCREEN, LUIS’ VAN BEHIND HIM. SCOTT LANG (ON SCREEN) Hello? Is anyone home? This is, uh, Scott Lang? We met a few years ago. At the airport?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: This an old message?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: (stunned) It’s the front gate.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: What? Yes. He turns to STEVE and NATASHA. SCOTT LANG (CONT'D) Have either of you guys ever studied quantum physics?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Only to make conversation. Steve glances at her. She shrugs.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: Well, five years ago, just before this Thanos guy...I went into a place called the Quantum Realm. It’s like its own microscopic universe. You can only get there if you’re incredibly small. Hope, she’s my...she was supposed to pull me out. But then Thanos happened. And I was stuck in there.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: I’m sorry. It must’ve been a long five years. 23 24

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: (getting excited) Okay, but that’s the thing. It wasn’t. For me, it was only five hours. The rules in the Quantum Realm aren’t like out here. They’re completely unpredictable. Is anybody gonna eat that sandwich?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Scott, what are you talking about?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: Time works differently in the Quantum Realm. Steve and Natasha share a look. SCOTT LANG (CONT'D) Problem is, right now, it’s chaos, there’s no way to navigate it. But what if we could figure out a way to enter the Quantum Realm at a certain point in time...and come out in another. Like, before Thanos-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Wait...wait. Scott. Are you talking about a time machine?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: No, not a machine. More like a... (searches, then gives up) Yeah, like a time machine. I know it sounds crazy...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Scott, I get emails from a raccoon. Nothing’s crazy anymore.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: So, who do we talk to about this?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Morgan H. Stark. Chow time. Want some lunch? Silence. Then MORGAN STARK (4) steps out of her play tent, wearing A PURPLE-BLUE IRON MAN HELMET (RESCUE).

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MORGAN STARK
SPEECH.LINE: Define lunch or be disintegrated.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: You should not be wearing that. It’s part of a special anniversary gift I made for Mom. You thinking about lunch? Tony gently takes the helmet off, revealing A YOUNG GIRL. TONY (CONT'D) Where’d you find this?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MORGAN STARK
SPEECH.LINE: Garage. Tony picks her up, walking toward the house.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: You like going in the garage? So does Daddy. It’s all right. Mommy never wears what I buy her. TIME CUT: Tony and Morgan exit the woods. Suddenly, Tony stops. In the driveway, STEVE ROGERS stares at him. NATASHA AND SCOTT GET OUT OF THE CAR BEHIND HIM.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: I just want to thank you folks for dropping by. It’s not every day one gets to contemplate biting it on an inter-dimensional timescape.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: You’ve got some objections to the plan. 25 26

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: So you’re calling it a plan. To me, it sounds like an exotic suicide method. Not to mention, it’s impossible.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: We know what it sounds like.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Tony, after what you’ve seen, is anything really impossible?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Quantum fluctuation kinda messes with the Planck Scale, which then triggers the Deutsch Proposition, can we agree on that? (offering more tea) Chai? (back on message) In layman’s terms, it means you can cancel your Netflix subscription because you’re not coming home.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: I did.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Which was a billion-to-one cosmic fluke. Now you want to pull a- What are you calling it?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: A time heist.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Oh, of course, a time heist, why didn’t we think of this before? Right, because it’s a pipe dream. Who are you again?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: Still Scott...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Tony, the Stones exist in the past. We could get them and bring them here.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: We can snap our own fingers. We can bring everybody back. 26 27

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Or screw it up worse than he already has.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: I don’t believe we would. Tony stares at Steve, a lot of water under the bridge.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Gotta say it. Sometimes I’ve missed that giddy optimism. Sadly, all your high hopes won’t help me if there’s no logical, tangible way for me to safely execute said “time heist.” I believe the most likely outcome would be our collective demise.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: Not if we strictly follow the rules of time travel. No talking to our past selves. No betting on sporting events-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Stop, Scott. Stop. Are you telling me that your plan to save the universe is more than loosely based on Back to the Future?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: (meaning “yes”) No...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Good. Because that would be horseshit. Scientifically speaking, your brother’s picture doesn’t disappear just ‘cause you went to the dance with your mom. That’s not how quantum physics works.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: We have to take a stand.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: We did stand. And yet here we are.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: Look, Stark- Can I call you Tony? 27 28

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Please don’t-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: Tony-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Fine.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: I get that you’ve got a lot on the line, here. You’ve got a wife. A daughter. But I lost someone very important - a lot of us did - and now we have a chance to save her, and everyone else, and you won’t even-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: No, Scott. I won’t. Even. Suddenly, MORGAN walks onto the porch.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MORGAN STARK
SPEECH.LINE: Mommy told me to come save you. Tony takes Morgan into his arms and heads inside.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Good job. I’m saved. (to Steve) I wish you were coming here to ask me something else. I’m honestly happy to see you. If you want to stay- Steve tries one last time.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Tony, I get it. And I’m happy for you. I am. But this is a second chance.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Yeah, well, I got my second chance right here. I can’t roll the dice on it. The table is set for six. If you don’t talk shop, you’re welcome to stay for lunch. He exits. 28 29

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: He’s scared.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: He’s not wrong.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: What are we gonna do? We need him. You want to stop?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: No. I want to do it right. (beat) We’re going to need a really big brain.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: Bigger than his?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: These are confusing times.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: No, that’s not what I’m-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: I’m kidding, I get it. It’s crazy. I wear shirts now!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: But why?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: Five years ago, we got our asses kicked, right? 29 --- 30 Smart Hulk eats a stack of pancakes in two bites.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: He’s heard.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: It was worse for me. Because I lost twice. First Hulk lost. Then Banner lost. Then we all lost.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: No one blamed you, Bruce.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: I did- I feel like I’m the only one eating. Here, try some. He holds out a pizza. They decline. He shrugs. SMART HULK (CONT'D) Thing is, I kept thinking, it didn’t have to be that way. That the best of Banner and best of Hulk, if they’d worked together, maybe they could’ve stopped Thanos.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: Okay. But how did...this happen?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: For years I treated the Hulk like a disease, something to get rid of. But when I started treating him like the cure... Smart Hulk MESHES HIS FINGERS together. SMART HULK (CONT'D) Eighteen months in the Gamma Lab. I put the brains and the brawn together. And now look at me. Best of both worlds. TWO KIDS amble up to the booth.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: KID
SPEECH.LINE: Mr. Hulk? Can we get a picture?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: 100%, little lady. The kid hands a phone to Steve. SMART HULK makes a duck face as Steve sheepishly snaps the pic, handing the phone back. 30 31 SMART HULK (CONT'D) (to the fan) Thanks, pal. Hulk out!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: So, Bruce, about what we said-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: The time travel do-over? I don’t know, that’s kind of outside my field of expertise... Natasha nods at his Smart Hulk-ness, history between them.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: You pulled this off. I remember a time that was impossible, too. He considers, then finally relents, pulling out his phone.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: I’m supposed to be on Oprah next week, but I guess I could move things around.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Friday, you up?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FRIDAY
SPEECH.LINE: Yes, sir.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: I’ve had a mild inspiration, like to see if it checks out. I would like to run one last sim before we pack it in for the night. This time, in the shape of a Mobius Strip, inverted. 31 32

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FRIDAY
SPEECH.LINE: Processing. The model forms.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: All right, give me the eigenvalue of that particle, factoring in spectral decomp. Run it. That’ll take a second. And don’t worry if it doesn’t pan out, I’m just kind of... THE CAPACITOR GLOWS. A HOLO-MAN DRIFTS INTO A CIRCULAR WORMHOLE, LOOPING...RETURNING TO THE PLACE IT FIRST LEFT.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FRIDAY
SPEECH.LINE: Model rendered.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: (in awe) Shit. MORGAN STARK (O.S.) Shit. Tony turns to see HIS DAUGHTER in the doorway.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: What are you doing up?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MORGAN STARK
SPEECH.LINE: Shit.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: First of all, that’s a Mommy word, she coined it.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MORGAN STARK
SPEECH.LINE: Why are you up?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: I just had something on my mind.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MORGAN STARK
SPEECH.LINE: Was it juice pops?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Correct. Great minds think alike. What kind do you want? 32 33

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: You done? (finishing her popsicle) Now you are.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MORGAN STARK
SPEECH.LINE: Tell me a story.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Once upon a time, Maguna went to bed. The end.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MORGAN STARK
SPEECH.LINE: That was a bad story. He runs his hand over her hair.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Love you tons.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MORGAN STARK
SPEECH.LINE: Love you three thousand.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Wow, that’s a lot. Tony turns out the light, exits.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PEPPER POTTS
SPEECH.LINE: That’s up there.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: What’re you reading?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PEPPER POTTS
SPEECH.LINE: A book about composting- 33 34

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: I think I solved it. Pepper looks up.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PEPPER POTTS
SPEECH.LINE: Just so we’re both talking about the same thing-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Time travel.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PEPPER POTTS
SPEECH.LINE: That’s amazing.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Yeah.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PEPPER POTTS
SPEECH.LINE: And terrifying.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: To say the least. He sits beside her. She stares, SHARING IN HIS DILEMMA.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PEPPER POTTS
SPEECH.LINE: We got really lucky-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: I know-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PEPPER POTTS
SPEECH.LINE: Not everybody did.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: I can’t help everybody.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PEPPER POTTS
SPEECH.LINE: Except, it sort of seems like you can.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Not if I stopped right here.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PEPPER POTTS
SPEECH.LINE: Tony, trying to get you to stop is one of the few failures of my life.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: I could just lock the lab, put it in a trunk, sink it to the bottom of the lake, and go to bed. 34 35

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PEPPER POTTS
SPEECH.LINE: But could you rest?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: You’re sure these modifications are safe? He looks over to...SMART HULK, WEARING READING GLASSES, MAKING ADJUSTMENTS TO A NEW CONTROL PANEL.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: I reran my calculations three times-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: Because the guy who invented this thing is pretty much a genius-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: I have seven PhD’s, an MD, the Hans Bethe Award for Physics, and I’m personal friends with Bill Nye the Science Guy. We’re good.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: Yeah. And you look like that on purpose. STEVE and NATASHA enter from outside.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Breakers are set, emergency generator’s on stand-by.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: Good. If we blow the grid, I don’t want to lose Tiny back in the ‘50’s.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: Excuse me?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: He was kidding.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: I was kidding. 35 36

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: (to Hulk) You were kidding, right?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: Honestly, I have no idea. We’re attempting time travel. Either it’s all a joke, or none of it is. (loudly to Scott) We’re good! Helmet on. Scott puts on his helmet, slightly dubious. SMART HULK (CONT'D) Okay. I’m going to send you back one week, give you an hour to look around, then bring you back in ten seconds. Make sense?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: Perfectly not confusing.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Good luck, Scott. You’ve got this.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: (inspired) Yes, I do, Captain America. Yes, I- SMART HULK PULLS A LEVER. SCOTT SHRINKS TO NOTHING.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: Counting down from three, two, one... SUDDENLY SCOTT REAPPEARS...BUT HE’S 12-YEARS-OLD.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: Uh, guys? This doesn’t feel right.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Is that Scott?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: Probably...? He scrambles, hitting buttons. SCOTT SHRINKS TO NOTHING.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Get him back! Smart Hulk flips a switch. SCOTT REAPPEARS...AT AGE 93. 36 37

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: Oh, my back!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Bruce! Get it under control. What the hell is going on?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: I got it, I know exactly what’s going on. Pretty much. SCOTT SHRINKS TO NOTHING AGAIN. HULK TYPES FRANTICALLY with A PENCIL, fingers too big for the keys. 2-YEAR OLD SCOTT APPEARS.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Oh, my God.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: It’s a baby.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: It’s Scott.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: As a baby! Smart Hulk hits a button. Baby Scott disappears.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: When I tell you, kill the power! (throwing a switch) Now! NATASHA KILLS THE POWER. Normal Scott stumbles off the pad.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: Somebody peed my pants. I don’t know if it was baby-me or old-me. Or just me-me.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Why the long face? Wild guess, he turned into a baby? 37 38

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Among other things.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: (getting out of the car) EPR Paradox. Instead of pushing Lang through time, you were pushing time through Lang. It’s dangerous. I probably should’ve cautioned you against it.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: You did.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Thank god, I’m here. Regardless, I fixed it. He holds up...HIS STAR-SHAPED CAPACITOR. TONY (CONT'D) That is a fully-functioning, time- space GPS. I just want peace. Resentment is corrosive. I hate it.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Me, too. Something eases between them, for the first time in years.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: We’ve got a shot at the Stones. I just need you to know my priorities. Bring back everyone we lost, hopefully. Keep what I found, definitely. And, let’s not die trying. Steve looks at Tony. Finally, he offers his hand.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Sounds like a deal. They shake. This is a long time coming. Finally...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: But wait, there’s more. Act now, and it comes with a bonus offer. Tony pops the trunk. Steve stares, moved, at...HIS SHIELD.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Tony, I don’t know- 38 39

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: What’s to know? He made it for you. Plus, I gotta get it out of the garage before Morgan takes it sledding. Steve finally picks up the shield, SLIDING IT ONTO HIS ARM.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Thank you, Tony. Tony chokes up, then covers by slamming the trunk.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Just don’t flaunt it. I didn’t bring enough for the whole team. We are getting the whole team, right?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: We’re trying.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROCKET
SPEECH.LINE: Hey, Humie. Where’s Big Green?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: Um, kitchen, I think. Scott tries a smile at Nebula. She just hits her COM: NEBULA (INTO COM) Rhodey, careful on re-entry. There’s an idiot in the landing zone. She goes in. THEN, WHAM, WAR MACHINE LANDS, STARTLING SCOTT.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: Oh, my God!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: RHODEY
SPEECH.LINE: What’s up, Regular-Sized Man? Rhodey goes inside as SMART HULK walks out, carrying an overnight bag. He hands Scott some tacos. 39 40

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROCKET
SPEECH.LINE: Finally. I ain’t got all day.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: I call shotgun! As he walks up the Benatar’s gangway, PRE-LAP A METALLIC SCRAPING SOUND.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROCKET
SPEECH.LINE: What the heck are they looking at?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: I’m kind of famous...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROCKET
SPEECH.LINE: Yeah, I’m sure that’s it. Kind of a step down from golden palaces and magic hammers...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: They lost Asgard, then half their people. Maybe they’re just happy to have a home. VALKYRIE (O.S.) You shouldn’t have come. VALKYRIE approaches from the pier. Smart Hulk GRINS.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: Hey, Valkyrie! Great to see you! He goes for a hug...VAL DOESN’T. She studies the new him.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: VALKYRIE
SPEECH.LINE: Uh huh. I liked you better either of the other ways. 40 41

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: This is Rocket.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROCKET
SPEECH.LINE: Hey.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: VALKYRIE
SPEECH.LINE: Hey. (to both) He won’t see you.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: We didn’t say we were here to see-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: VALKYRIE
SPEECH.LINE: Great, then you can hose out the gut buckets-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROCKET
SPEECH.LINE: We’re definitely here to see him.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: VALKYRIE
SPEECH.LINE: He can’t give you what you need.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: It’s that bad?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: VALKYRIE
SPEECH.LINE: We only see him once a month. When he comes in for “supplies.” She nods to A DOZEN BEER KEGS STACKED OUTSIDE A PUB.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROCKET
SPEECH.LINE: Something died in here.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: Hello...? Thor...? THOR (O.S.) Are you here about the cable? We hear a HEAVY SHUFFLING as someone approaches. 41 42 THOR (CONT'D) Cinemax went out two days ago, and the sports are all...fuzzy... THOR enters, CONFUSED, A LITTLE DRUNK, SHIRTLESS...AND TREMENDOUSLY FAT. Rocket and Hulk stare.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: Thor?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: BROS! Bring it in! Thor hugs Smart Hulk. He turns to Rocket, who steps back.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROCKET
SPEECH.LINE: Yeah, I’m good.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Hulk, you know my boys, Korg and Miek, right? KORG and MIEK sit on the couch, playing Playstation 4.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: KORG
SPEECH.LINE: Beer’s in the bucket. Feel free to log on to the WiFi.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: Hey, guys. Long time no-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: KORG
SPEECH.LINE: Thor! This kid on the TV just called me a dickhead!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Noobmaster again?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: KORG
SPEECH.LINE: NoobMaster69 called me a dickhead- Thor snatches KORG’S HEADSET and hisses into the mic.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Noobmaster, this is Thor, again. God of Thunder. This is your last warning. Log off this game or I will come to your basement, rip off your arms and shove them up your butt. (handing the headset back) Right, who wants a drink? 42 (MORE) 43 SMART HULK AND ROCKET JUST STARE. Thor pulls a beer from the fridge, and whacks the cap against STORMBREAKER.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: Hey, buddy, are you all right?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Don’t I look all right?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROCKET
SPEECH.LINE: (under his breath) You look like melted ice cream-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: So, what’s up? Just here for a hang?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: We need your help. There’s a chance we can fix everything.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Like the cable? It’s driving me bananas.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: Like Thanos. THOR GRABS HULK’S SHIRT, INTENSE. KORG RISES FROM THE COUCH.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Don’t say that name.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: KORG
SPEECH.LINE: Yeah, we don’t say that name in here. Smart Hulk looks down at THOR’S HAND STILL ON HIS SHIRT.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: Please take your hand off me. Thor looks into Hulk’s eyes...and gently removes his hand. SMART HULK (CONT'D) Now, I know the thought of...that guy might scare you-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Scared? Why would I be scared of that guy? I’m the one who killed that guy, remember? (looking around) Anyone else here kill that guy? (MORE) 43 THOR (CONT'D) 44 Didn’t think so. Korg, tell everyone who chopped Thanos’ head off.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: KORG
SPEECH.LINE: Stormbreaker? Thor uncaps a whiskey bottle. BLAM, IT SHATTERS IN HIS HAND. Reveal...ROCKET, BLASTER SMOKING.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Not. Cool. Man.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROCKET
SPEECH.LINE: Don’t. Care. Dude.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: Look, I get it. You’re in a rough patch. I’ve been there. But you know who helped me out of it?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Was it Natasha?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: It was you. You helped me. And I need you to help me again.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Ask the Asgardians down there how much “my help” is worth.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROCKET
SPEECH.LINE: At least they’re alive-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: They were gods! Now they’re fisherpeople! (sagging into a chair) The ones that are left, anyway.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: That’s the thing. I think we can bring them back. Thor’s tempted, but shakes his head.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Stop. Stop. I know you think I’m down here, wallowing in my own self- pity, waiting to be rescued. But I’m fine. I’m happy. Whatever it is you’re offering, don’t care. Couldn’t care less. THOR (CONT'D) 44 45 Hulk and Rocket stare at Thor.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: Come on, pal. We need you. He still can’t meet their gaze. Finally...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROCKET
SPEECH.LINE: There’s beer in the ship.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: (beat) What kind?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AKIHIKO
SPEECH.LINE: (Japanese, subtitled) Why are you doing this? We never did anything to you!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: RONIN
SPEECH.LINE: (Japanese, subtitled) You survived. Half the planet didn’t. They got Thanos. You get me. Akihiko attacks. Ronin slashes him across the middle. RONIN (CONT'D) (Japanese, subtitled) You’re done hurting people. Akihiko gestures at the bodies in the street.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AKIHIKO
SPEECH.LINE: We hurt people? You’re crazy. Ronin slashes Akihiko’s throat. The man drops to his knees. AKIHIKO (CONT'D) Wait! Help me! I’ll give you anything! What do you want?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: RONIN
SPEECH.LINE: What I want...you can’t give me. Ronin finishes him off. AKIHIKO GOES STILL. SIRENS WAIL. Ronin removes his mask, revealing... CLINT BARTON, haggard. He hears A FOOTFALL. He whirls, katana raised...then stops. His face goes slack as... NATASHA STEPS INTO A POOL OF LIGHT, A LARGE BLACK UMBRELLA KEEPING HER FROM THE RAIN. They stare at each other. Clint hasn’t seen her in years. She hasn’t seen what he’s become. 46 -- 47

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CLINT BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: You shouldn’t be here.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Neither should you.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CLINT BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: I’ve got a job to do.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: That what you’re calling this? She moves even closer. He stiffens. NATASHA (CONT'D) Killing these people isn’t going to bring your family back. (beat) We found something. A chance, maybe...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CLINT BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: Don’t.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Don’t what?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CLINT BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: Give me hope.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: I’m just sorry I couldn’t give it sooner. CLINT DISSOLVES, sagging into her arms.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: And you’re only in there because you have tiny hands. ROCKET, COVERED IN GREASE, WRIGGLES OUT A HATCH.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROCKET
SPEECH.LINE: Fixed it.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Thank you.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROCKET
SPEECH.LINE: Get used to saying that.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: RHODEY
SPEECH.LINE: Time travel suit, I like it. SMART HULK awkwardly tries to fit a pair of RED TEST TUBES INTO THE TIME SUIT’S BELT.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: Easy, easy. Careful with those.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: I’m being very careful-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: You’re being very Hulky- Scott takes the tubes from him and inserts them, himself. SCOTT LANG (CONT'D) These are Pym Particles. You can’t shrink to the Quantum Realm without them, and since Hank Pym got snapped out of existence, we can’t make any more. I told you. We’ve only got enough for one round trip each, no do-overs. Scott gently clicks the tubes into their housing. SCOTT LANG (CONT'D) Plus two test runs- SUDDENLY, SCOTT SHRINKS INTO NOTHING, THEN GROWS BACK. He takes that in... 48 49 SCOTT LANG (CONT'D) One test run. (embarrassed) Okay, maybe I’m not ready. CLINT BARTON (O.S.) I’m game. They turn to see CLINT leaning in the doorway. CLINT BARTON (CONT'D) I’ll do it. TIME CUT: NOW, CLINT WEARS THE TIME SUIT. Scott looks on, sulky. SMART HULK, RHODEY, and NEBULA attach the Pym housing.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: Okay, Clint, you might feel a little disoriented when you chronoshift-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: RHODEY
SPEECH.LINE: Hang on, I’ve got to ask, if we can do this, why don’t we just go find baby Thanos and, you know... Rhodey makes a STRANGLING GESTURE.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: Uh, one, because that’s horrible. And, two, killing baby Thanos doesn’t kill adult Thanos. Time doesn’t work like that. You can’t change the future by changing the past.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: Sure, we can. We take the stones before Thanos gets them, then he doesn’t have them. Problem solved.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: That’s not how it works.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CLINT BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: I don’t know. That is kind of what I’ve heard-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: Heard from who? 49 50

SPEECH.SPEAKER: RHODEY
SPEECH.LINE: Star Trek. Terminator. Bill and Ted’s Excellent-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: WHY DOES EVERYONE THINK THIS? THAT’S NOT TRUE. IF YOU TRAVEL TO THE PAST, THEN THAT PAST HAS BECOME YOUR PRESENT, AND YOUR FORMER PRESENT HAS BECOME THE PAST, WHICH NOW CAN’T BE CHANGED BY YOUR NEW FUTURE!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: Exactly.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: RHODEY
SPEECH.LINE: Excuse me? Scott leans over, whispering:

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: Apparently, Back to the Future is bullshit.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CLINT BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: Look, are we doing this or not?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: Okay, Clint. Starting in three, two, one... Clint nods over at them, determined. SUDDENLY, HE STRETCHES, SHRINKS, AND VANISHES. WHOOSH.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CLINT BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: No. Not yet... (opening the door) LILA! BUT HIS BODY STARTS TO GLOW. 0.01- CLINT VANISHES. THE SCREEN DOOR SLAMS. After a moment, LILA runs in.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LILA BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: Dad?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Are you all right? Hey, look at me. You okay?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Tell me something good... Clint looks up, tearful. He holds out THE BASEBALL MITT.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CLINT BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: It worked. It worked. Reveal Steve, Smart Hulk, Nebula, Rhodey, Scott, Thor, and Rocket, looking on.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROCKET
SPEECH.LINE: Holy crap. We’re freaking time travelers.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Okay. Now that we’ve got how, we’re going to need where and when. NEBULA, TONY, RHODEY, SCOTT, SMART HULK, ROCKET, NATASHA, and CLINT look on. STEVE (CONT'D) Most folks here have encountered at least one of the six Infinity Stones-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: I think you mean nearly been killed by one of the six Infinity Stones.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: I haven’t. (off their looks) Just...saying.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: Regardless, we’ve only got enough Pym Particles for one round trip, each. And the Stones have been in a lot of places throughout history.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Our history. Not all of them are going to be a fun drop-in.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CLINT BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: Which means we’ve got to pick our targets.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Exactly. (he taps “REALITY”) Let’s start with the Aether. Thor, what do we know? Everyone looks toward...THOR, slumped over.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Is he asleep?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: RHODEY
SPEECH.LINE: I’m pretty sure he’s dead. DISSOLVE TO: THOR sulks, looking at the Aether Container Holo: “REALITY” Locations are listed: “SVARTALFHEIM, KNOWHERE, LONDON.” 52 (MORE) 53

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: The Aether’s not a stone, it’s more of an angry sludge. My grandfather hid it from Dark Elves in a rock between dimensions that can only be accessed every 5000 years. HIS ROBOTIC EYE drifts off in the wrong direction. Thor bangs his head, resetting his eye. THOR (CONT'D) Or...by Jane. She stuck her hand in a rock. Then the Aether stuck itself inside her. Then I took her to Asgard. We were dating... (depressed) We’re not anymore. Everyone stares. DISSOLVE TO:

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROCKET
SPEECH.LINE: Quill said he stole the Power Stone from Morag. He paces on top of the table, past SMART HULK EATING A PINT OF “HUNKA HULKA BURNING FUDGE.”

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: That’s a person?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROCKET
SPEECH.LINE: It’s a planet. Quill was a person.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: Wait, like a planet...in space? Rocket pinches Scott’s cheek.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROCKET
SPEECH.LINE: Aw, look. It’s like a puppy, all happy and everything. (MORE) 53 ROCKET (CONT'D) 54 You want to go to space, puppy? I’ll take you to space. DISSOLVE TO:

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: Thanos found the Soul Stone on Vormir.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: And that is...?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: A dominion of death at the very center of celestial existence. (beat) It’s the place where Thanos murdered my sister. That hangs heavily. A moment passes. Then...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: Not it. DISSOLVE TO:

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: So this ‘Time Stone’ guy...what kind of doctor was he?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: Strange?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Cross between ear-nose-and-throat and rabbit-from-hat.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: Had a nice place in the Village.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Yeah. Sullivan Street. ROCKET (CONT'D) 54 55

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: Bleecker.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Sullivan and Bleecker. They’re cross streets.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Wait, he lived in New York? Guys, pick the right year and there were three stones in New York.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: (beat) Shut the front door...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Okay, we have a plan. Six stones, three teams, one shot. He steps away, revealing the board...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: EVERYONE EYES THE TANGLE OF LINES CONNECTING SIX STONES TO
SPEECH.LINE: FOUR LOCATIONS TO TWO YEARS TO TEN HEROES. IT’S INSANE.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.RECEIVER: EVERYONE EYES THE TANGLE OF LINES CONNECTING SIX STONES TO
SPEECH.LINE: We lost friends. We lost family. We lost a part of ourselves. (beat) But today we have a chance to take it all back. Steve takes in the groupings of heroes: RHODEY & NEBULA, NAT & CLINT, THOR & ROCKET, TONY & SCOTT. 55 56 STEVE (CONT'D) You have your teams and you have assignments. Get your stone, and get back here. One round trip each. No mistakes. No do-overs. He grips HIS SHIELD. STEVE (CONT'D) Most of us are going back to places we know. That doesn’t mean we know what to expect. Be careful. Look out for each other. Improvise, if you have to. (looking around) This is the fight of our lives. And we’re going to win. (beat) Whatever it takes. The platform stays quiet. Rocket WHISPERS to Scott:

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROCKET
SPEECH.LINE: He’s pretty good at that... Scott nods enthusiastically.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: (to Smart Hulk) All right, you heard the man. Stroke those keys, Jolly Green. Smart Hulk taps in commands with HIS PENCIL. LIGHTS ILLUMINATE EACH PAD.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: Tracking beacons engaged. Clint checks his pocket: A SHRUNKEN BENATAR sits inside.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROCKET
SPEECH.LINE: You promise to bring that thing back in one piece?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CLINT BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: Yeah, sure thing. I’ll do my best.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROCKET
SPEECH.LINE: That’s pretty lame, as far as promises go. SMART HULK STEPS ONTO THE PLATFORM, COMPLETING THE LINEUP. THE PLATFORM BEGINS TO VIBRATE. NATASHA LOOKS AROUND. 56 57

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: See you in a minute.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: Actually, it’ll be closer to seven or eight microseconds, give or- SUDDENLY, THEY STRETCH AND VANISH, SHRINKING AWAY. WHOOSH. THE QUANTUM CONSOLE STOPS VIBRATING. HULK’S PENCIL SLOWLY ROLLS TOWARD THE EDGE...AND DROPS OFF-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Okay, Park Avenue’s that way. Let’s huddle up. Suits off. They all touch their cuffs, RETRACTING THEIR TIME SUITS.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: We’ve all got our assignments. Two stones uptown, one stone down. Stay low, keep an eye on time- Just then, A1 HULK BOUNDS DOWN THE STREET SMASHING THINGS. STEVE (CONT'D) And Bruce? Maybe smash a few things along the way. For appearances.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: (taking off his shirt) All right, but I have to say, it seems gratuitous. He half-heartedly smashes a few cars. 57 58 SMART HULK (CONT'D) Grrr...grrr...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: Hulk...does what...Hulk want?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ANCIENT ONE
SPEECH.LINE: Yes, I suppose that would be the case- JUST THEN, ON THE ROOF OPPOSITE, A1 HULK TACKLES A CHITAURI CHARIOT, RIPPING IT IN HALF. HE ROARS, LEAPING AWAY. Smart Hulk blinks, sheepish. The Ancient One looks at him. ANCIENT ONE (CONT'D) Care to explain?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: I’m looking for Dr. Strange.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ANCIENT ONE
SPEECH.LINE: You’re about five years too early. Stephen Strange is currently performing surgery, 20 blocks that way. What do you want with him? He finally notices THE EYE OF AGAMOTTO HANGING FROM HER NECK.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: Well, that, actually. 58 59

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ANCIENT ONE
SPEECH.LINE: Ah. I’m afraid not.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: I’m seriously sorry but...I wasn’t asking. Smart Hulk cracks his knuckles and moves in. She smiles.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ANCIENT ONE
SPEECH.LINE: You don’t want to do this.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: You’re right, I don’t. But I need that stone, and I don’t have a lot of time to debate it- He reaches for it. THE ANCIENT ONE SLAMS HER PALM INTO HIS CHEST AND BLASTS BRUCE BANNER RIGHT OUT OF SMART HULK. “ASTRAL BANNER” hangs in the air, staring at his frozen Smart Hulk body. He looks at his human hands, overwhelmed.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ASTRAL BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: No, no, no- She topples Smart Hulk’s body with one finger. Whump.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ANCIENT ONE
SPEECH.LINE: Now. Let’s start over, shall we?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: That’s Jane.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROCKET
SPEECH.LINE: Okay, here’s the deal. You’re going to charm her, and I’m going to poke her with this thing, extract the Reality Stone, and get gone lickety-split. Thor looks off in the other direction, anxious.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Um, I’ll be right back. The wine cellar is just down here. My father used to have this barrel of Aakonian ale. Felt like getting hit in the face with a poleaxe. I’ll see if the scullery has a couple of to-go cups- They hear SOMEONE APPROACHING. Rocket yanks Thor back as...FRIGGA AND HER HANDMAIDENS ENTER THE CORRIDOR.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FRIGGA
SPEECH.LINE: Send Loki some soup. I don’t think he’s eating. And ask our librarians to pull some volumes from the astronomy shelves. He won’t read them, but at least they’ll keep him company. Thor watches Frigga and her coterie disappear down the hall.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROCKET
SPEECH.LINE: Who’s the fancy broad?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: My mother. She dies today.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROCKET
SPEECH.LINE: Oh, jeez. Thor starts to sweat.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: I can’t do this. This is a bad idea. I can’t do this... Rocket climbs onto a marble monument.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROCKET
SPEECH.LINE: Come here. 60 (MORE) 61 Thor steps closer. ROCKET SLAPS HIM ACROSS THE FACE. ROCKET (CONT'D) You think you’re the only one who’s lost people? What do you think we’re doing here? I lost the only family I ever had. Quill, Groot, Drax, the chick with the antenna. All gone. I’ve lived five meaningless years without them, and every minute has blown Aaskvarian gornads. I get you miss your mom. But she’s gone. Really gone. There are plenty of people who are only kind of gone. And you can help them. So, is it too much to ask that you brush the crumbs out of your beard, make shmoopy talk to Prettypants, and when she’s not looking, suck out the Infinity Stone, and help me get my family back? Thor stares at him a long moment. He wipes his tears away.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: I guess not.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROCKET
SPEECH.LINE: Good.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Thank you. I can do this.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROCKET
SPEECH.LINE: Great. As Rocket scurries to Jane’s door, Thor murmurs to himself.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: I can do this...I can do this... (beat) I can’t do this...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROCKET
SPEECH.LINE: (peering through keyhole) All right, heartbreaker. This is our shot... Rocket turns to find...THOR NOWHERE TO BE SEEN. ROCKET (CONT'D) Thor? (holding his temples) (MORE) 61 ROCKET (CONT'D) 62 I can kill him, and say the Elves did it.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: RHODEY
SPEECH.LINE: That’s it, right on that line, Blue. Keep dropping it. Nearby, CLINT SURVEYS THE PLANET. GEYSERS EXPLODE. CLIFFS LOOM. AN ORLONI bites NATASHA’s boot. She kicks it away.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CLINT BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: (to Rhodey) Hey, can we hurry it up?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Yeah, come on, chop chop, we’re on the clock, here.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: RHODEY
SPEECH.LINE: All that? Really helpful! TIME CUT: Clint and Natasha board the Benatar. Rhodey and Nebula remain on the planet’s surface.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Take care of yourself.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: RHODEY
SPEECH.LINE: Get that stone and come back. No messing around. You guys watch each other’s six. TIME CUT: BESIDE THE POD, RHODEY AND NEBULA WATCH THE BENATAR TAKE OFF.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: Coordinates for Vormir are laid in. All they have to do is not fall out. ROCKET (CONT'D) 62 63

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: What?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CLINT BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: Nothing. Just...we’re a long way from Budapest.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: (pushing the throttle) Further every second.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: RHODEY
SPEECH.LINE: So, all we have to do is hang out, wait for this Quill guy, and follow him to the Power Stone, right?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: Let’s take cover. We’re not the only ones in this reality looking for the stones.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: RHODEY
SPEECH.LINE: Hey, who are you talking about right now? Who else is looking for the stones?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: My father. My sister. And me. MOVE IN ON RHODEY, CONCERNED.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: RHODEY
SPEECH.LINE: You? Where are you? CUT TO:

SPEECH.SPEAKER: GAMORA
SPEECH.LINE: You’re welcome?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BAD NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: I didn’t ask for your help.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: GAMORA
SPEECH.LINE: And yet you always need it. Father wants us back on the ship. Gamora offers her hand. Bad Nebula stands on her own.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BAD NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: Why?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: GAMORA
SPEECH.LINE: He’s found an Infinity Stone. Off Bad Nebula’s intrigued look...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BAD NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: Where?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: GAMORA
SPEECH.LINE: On a planet called “Morag.”

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THANOS
SPEECH.LINE: Ronan has located the Power Stone. I’m dispatching you to his ship.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: GAMORA
SPEECH.LINE: He won’t like it. Thanos wipes the blood from his blade.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THANOS
SPEECH.LINE: His alternative is death. Ronan’s obsession clouds his judgement. After Loki, I’m taking no chances.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BAD NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: We will not fail you, father. Thanos finally lays his eyes on her.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THANOS
SPEECH.LINE: No. You won’t.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BAD NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: I swear I will make you proud- SUDDENLY, BAD NEBULA STAGGERS, hand to the wall.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: GAMORA
SPEECH.LINE: Sister, what’s- 65 66 Thanos watches, curious, as NEBULA DROPS TO A KNEE. SUDDENLY, A HOLO-PROJECTION OF RHODEY BEAMS FROM HER EYE. RHODEY (HOLO) So, all we have to do is hang out, wait for this Quill guy, and follow him to the Power Stone, right? NEBULA (HOLO) (O.S) Let’s take cover. We’re not the only ones in this reality looking for the stones. BAD NEBULA SLUMPS, breaking the projection. Gamora goes to her, trying to prop her up.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: GAMORA
SPEECH.LINE: Who was that?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BAD NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: I...don’t know. My head...splitting... Bad Nebula winces. Gamora looks to Thanos.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: GAMORA
SPEECH.LINE: Her synaptic drive was probably damaged in battle-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THANOS
SPEECH.LINE: Sshhh... Thanos looks down at Bad Nebula. He gently lifts her head with his blade. Something’s not right. THANOS (CONT'D) Bring her to my ship.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LOKI
SPEECH.LINE: If it’s all the same to you...I’ll have that drink now. From behind cover, TONY PEERS AT THE BACK SIDE OF THE AVENGERS TABLEAU. TONY (INTO COM) Cap, I’ve got to say that outfit does nothing for your ass. STEVE (OVER COM) No one asked you to look, Tony. REVEAL TINY SCOTT ON TONY’S SHOULDER. SCOTT LANG (INTO COM) I think you look great, Cap. As far as I’m concerned, that’s America’s ass. A1 NATASHA Who gets the magic wand? A1 STEVE SHIELD’s coming up now.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Ball’s in play. Head’s up, Cap. From hiding, Tony eyes A1 NATASHA WITH LOKI’S SCEPTER. INTERCUT:

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BROCK RUMLOW
SPEECH.LINE: We promise to be extra careful. Scott stares at Sitwell and Rumlow.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: Who are these guys?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: SHIELD. Actually, Hydra. But we didn’t know that yet.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: Seriously? ‘Cause it’s kind of obvious they’re bad guys.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: You’re small but you’re talking loud. A1 THOR WALKS LOKI PAST A1 STEVE. A1 STEVE (INTO COM) I’m on my way down to coordinate search and rescue. Loki rolls his eyes...AND TRANSFORMS INTO A COPY OF STEVE. LOKI/STEVE “I’m on my way down to coordinate search and rescue.” I mean, really, how do you keep your food down? Thor slaps A MUZZLE on Loki, who REVERTS TO HIS OWN FORM. A1 THOR Yes, that’s much better. He steers his brother into THE MAIN ELEVATOR. A1 THOR (CONT'D) You coming, Stark? 68 69 Nearby, A1 TONY uses his gauntleted hand to place THE TESSERACT into AN ALUMINUM ATTACHE CASE. A1 TONY One sec, just packing my lunch.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: All right, you’re up, Little Buddy. There’s our stone A1 Tony crosses to the elevator. Scott takes position, readying himself.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: All right. Flick me. Tony flicks Scott with a finger, sending him sailing into the ATTACHE CASE. TONY leaps out the window, Bleeding Edge armor forming around him as he falls. A1 Tony joins the others in the elevator. Then... A1 HULK steps up to THE ALREADY CROWDED ELEVATOR. Avengers smile awkwardly. There’s no room. A1 HULK (angrily) Hulk take stairs.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Change of plans. Steve glances at Rumlow, who’s holding THE SCEPTER.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BROCK RUMLOW
SPEECH.LINE: Cap.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Rumlow. The doors close. Everyone rides in silence. Tension mounts. STEVE (CONT'D) I got a call from the Secretary’s office. I’m going to be running point on the scepter. Behind him, Sitwell and Rumlow exchange a glance.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT SITWELL
SPEECH.LINE: Sir? I don’t understand-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: We’ve had word there might be an attempt to steal it. Steve reaches for the scepter, but Rumlow holds tight.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BROCK RUMLOW
SPEECH.LINE: Afraid we can’t allow that, Cap.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: AGENT SITWELL
SPEECH.LINE: (pulling out his phone) I’ll have to check with the Director-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: No. Trust me. It’s okay... Steve leans in, drawing them all close. Then he whispers: 70 71 STEVE (CONT'D) Hail Hydra. THEIR EYES GO WIDE.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ALEXANDER PIERCE
SPEECH.LINE: Mind if I ask where you’re going? A1 THOR We were thinking lunch, then Asgard. And you are? A1 TONY Alexander Pierce. He’s the guy behind the guys behind Fury, so don’t mess.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ALEXANDER PIERCE
SPEECH.LINE: My friends call me Mr. Secretary. (to Thor) I have to ask you to turn the prisoner over to me. A1 THOR Loki will answer to Odin, himself.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ALEXANDER PIERCE
SPEECH.LINE: No, he’ll answer to us. “Odin” can have what’s left. (to Tony) And we’ll need the case back, too. That’s been SHIELD property for over seventy years. A1 TONY I’m not gonna argue who has authority here but jurisdictionally speaking, we are on Stark property. That is my name on the glass...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ALEXANDER PIERCE
SPEECH.LINE: Just give me the case. Across the lobby, TONY OBSERVES FROM BEHIND HIS SWAT HELMET. 72 73 TONY (INTO COM) Move it, Stuart Little. Things are getting dicey out here. INTERCUT:

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: That doesn’t actually sound minor- Tony sees PIERCE reaching for A1 TONY’S CASE.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Window’s closing. Pull my plug.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: Here goes... SCOTT YANKS THE WIRE OUT OF ITS SOCKET. IN THE LOBBY, A1 TONY GRIPS HIS CHEST.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ALEXANDER PIERCE
SPEECH.LINE: Stark? A1 Tony SEIZES, dropping. THE TESSERACT CASE CLATTERS TO THE GROUND. PIERCE and A1 THOR kneel to assist. ALEXANDER PIERCE (CONT'D) MEDIC! A1 THOR Stark? Somebody get some help! Is it your chest machine? THE LOBBY BUZZES, SHIELD AGENTS RUNNING EVERYWHERE. In the bustle, SCOTT SLIDES OUT OF A1 TONY’S SLEEVE. He SHOVES THE TESSERACT CASE HARD. It SPINS across the floor... RIGHT INTO TONY’S HAND. Tony walks toward a side door. 73 74 TONY (INTO COM) Meet me in the alley. I’m just gonna grab a slice at Famous Ray’s- BUT AS TONY PASSES THE STAIRWELL DOOR...HULK BANGS IT OPEN, SMASHING TONY IN THE FACE, SENDING HIM TUMBLING. A1 HULK BASHES HIS WAY THROUGH THE LOBBY. The Tesseract Case hits the floor, popping open. THE TESSERACT FALLS OUT, spinning past Tiny Scott... STOPPING AT LOKI’S FEET. Loki stares at it in disbelief. He glances at A1 Thor and Pierce giving A1 Tony first aid. THEN LOKI CALMLY REACHES DOWN WITH HIS MANACLED HANDS, GRASPS THE TESSERACT...AND TELEPORTS AWAY. Scott stares, stunned.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: That wasn’t supposed to happen, was it? A1 THOR LOOKS UP, REALIZING... A1 THOR WHERE’S LOKI? SHIELD TEAMS FAN OUT, ON ALERT.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Oh, great. A1 STEVE (INTO COM) Disregard. I have eyes on Loki, Fourteenth Floor. 74 75 STEVE GENTLY LAYS THE SCEPTER DOWN, AND PULLS OFF HIS SHIELD.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: I’m not Loki. And I don’t want to hurt you. A1 STEVE PULLS HIS SHIELD OFF HIS BACK. A1 STEVE You’re not going to get the chance- A1 STEVE KICKS STEVE IN THE FACE. Steve stumbles.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Forgot about that one. They grapple. Both their shields fall to the ground... THEY BOTH STAMP ON THEM, simultaneously flipping the shields back to their arms. A1 Steve looks impressed. A1 STEVE SWINGS. STEVE DUCKS, HAMMERING HIM. A1 Steve wipes the blood from his lip, squaring off. A1 STEVE I can do this all day-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Yeah, I know... They battle on. A1 Steve tackles Steve, knocking his shield aside, RIPPING OPEN ONE OF STEVE’S BELT COMPARTMENTS: THE COMPASS FALLS OUT, OPENING TO REVEAL PEGGY’S PICTURE. A1 Steve goes cold. He picks up the compass, FLABBERGASTED. A1 STEVE Where’d you get this?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: PX. Camp Lehigh. 1943. A1 Steve stares at Steve, eyes narrowing. A1 STEVE You’ve got a lot of nerve. HE HAMMERS STEVE ACROSS THE HALL. Steve goes skidding. He groans, looking up to see...HE’S INCHES FROM THE SCEPTER. A1 STEVE moves in. STEVE whips around, touching THE SCEPTER to A1 Steve’s chest. A1 STEVE’S EYES GO BLACK. HE FREEZES. 75 76 Steve stares, panting. Finally, he picks up the compass from the floor, then considers A1 STEVE’S ASS.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: That is America’s ass.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ASTRAL BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: Yeah, with all due respect, I’m not sure the science supports that.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ANCIENT ONE
SPEECH.LINE: And yet, you’re the one currently standing in the middle of my hydrangeas. Banner looks down to see, indeed, he has phased through the middle of the hydrangeas. He steps out of it.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ASTRAL BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: Lady, I just want to borrow your necklace-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ANCIENT ONE
SPEECH.LINE: At what cost? SHE CONJURES A MAGICAL PROJECTION OF THE INFINITY STONES, SPINNING IN UNISON. A TUNNEL OF GOLDEN LIGHT POURS FORTH. ANCIENT ONE (CONT'D) The Infinity Stones create the experience you know as the flow of time. Remove one of the stones, and the flow splits. She plucks the GREEN TIME STONE out of the array: A SMALLER, BLACKENED RIVER BRANCHES OFF FROM THE FIRST. 76 (MORE) 77 ANCIENT ONE (CONT'D) Now, your timeline might benefit. My new one...would definitely not. SHE GESTURES. OUR CAMERA ZOOMS INTO THE BLACKENED TUNNEL... TUNNEL POV: HUNDREDS OF PEOPLE RUN AS WE FLY OVER A CROWDED STREET, UP TO...THE BURNING HONG KONG SANCTUM. ANCIENT ONE (O.S.) (CONT'D) In this new branch reality, without our chief weapon against the forces of darkness, our world would be overrun... MOVE UP TO SEE DORMAMMU IN THE SKY. HE OPENS HIS MOUTH... BACK ON THE ROOF...THE ANCIENT ONE PLUCKS MORE STONES FROM THE GOLDEN RIVER, CREATING FIVE MORE BLACKENED TRIBUTARIES. ANCIENT ONE (CONT'D) For each stone you remove, you’ll create a new, vulnerable timeline. Millions will suffer. (beat) Now tell me, Doctor. Can your science prevent all that?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ASTRAL BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: No. But it can erase it. Astral Banner reaches in and grabs THE VIRTUAL TIME STONE. ASTRAL BANNER (CONT'D) Because once we’re done with the stones, we can return each one to its own timeline. At the moment it was taken. So chronologically, in that reality, the stone never left. HE PUTS THE TIME STONE BACK. THE BLACK TIMELINE DISAPPEARS.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ANCIENT ONE
SPEECH.LINE: You’re leaving out the most important part, though. In order to put the stones back, you’d have to survive.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ASTRAL BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: We will. I will. I promise.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ANCIENT ONE
SPEECH.LINE: I can’t risk this reality on a promise. (MORE) 77 ANCIENT ONE (CONT'D) 78 It is the duty of the Sorcerer Supreme to protect the Time Stone-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ASTRAL BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: Yeah? Then why the hell did Strange give it away? The Ancient One freezes.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ANCIENT ONE
SPEECH.LINE: What did you say?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ASTRAL BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: Strange gave Thanos the Time Stone.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ANCIENT ONE
SPEECH.LINE: Willingly? Why?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ASTRAL BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: Don’t know. Maybe he made a mistake.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ANCIENT ONE
SPEECH.LINE: Or I did. The Ancient One looks out over a recovering NYC. ANCIENT ONE (CONT'D) Strange is meant to be the best of us.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ASTRAL BANNER
SPEECH.LINE: Then he must have had a reason.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ANCIENT ONE
SPEECH.LINE: I fear you may be right... Finally, she waves her hand and...WHOOSH! HE REINTEGRATES INTO THE SMART HULK BODY. Smart Hulk gets up, WOOZY. SHE REMOVES THE TIME STONE FROM THE EYE, HANDING IT TO HIM.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: Thank you.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ANCIENT ONE
SPEECH.LINE: I’m counting on you, Bruce. (re. the city behind her) We all are.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THANOS
SPEECH.LINE: Run diagnostics. Show me her memory file. At the console, EBONY MAW SCANS NEBULA’S INFORMATION. NEBULA’S BODY TWITCHES. GAMORA WATCHES, TORN. SOON...AN ALERT FLASHES.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: EBONY MAW
SPEECH.LINE: Sir, the file appears...entangled. It was a memory, but not hers. (dawning on him) There’s another consciousness sharing her network. Another Nebula.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THANOS
SPEECH.LINE: Impossible.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: EBONY MAW
SPEECH.LINE: This duplicate carries a time stamp...from nine years in the future.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THANOS
SPEECH.LINE: Where is this “other Nebula?”

SPEECH.SPEAKER: EBONY MAW
SPEECH.LINE: In our solar system. On Morag.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THANOS
SPEECH.LINE: Can you access her?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: EBONY MAW
SPEECH.LINE: Yes. The two are linked. THANOS PEERS INTO BAD NEBULA’S GLASSY EYES...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THANOS
SPEECH.LINE: Search the duplicate’s memory for Infinity Stones. Maw works the console. Thanos steps aside as BAD NEBULA’S BODY QUIVERS. AFTER A BEAT, A BEAM SHOOTS OUT OF HER EYE... PROJECTING AN IMAGE OF AVENGERS COMPOUND: 79 80 STEVE, TONY, RHODEY, SCOTT, SMART HULK, ROCKET, NATASHA, CLINT, AND THOR GATHER IN THE LIVING AREA. SMART HULK (HOLO) -the Stones have been in a lot of places throughout history. TONY (HOLO) Our history. Not all of them are going to be a fun drop-in. CLINT BARTON (HOLO) Which means we’ve got to pick our targets. STEVE (HOLO) Exactly. Let’s start here-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THANOS
SPEECH.LINE: Freeze image. THE IMAGE FREEZES. THANOS STARES, RECOGNIZING THEM.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: GAMORA
SPEECH.LINE: Terrans?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THANOS
SPEECH.LINE: Avengers. Unruly wretches. He gestures to A BLURRY REFLECTION WITHIN THE HOLOGRAM. THANOS (CONT'D) What’s this reflection. Amplify this, Maw. EBONY MAW ZOOMS IN, REVEALING...A REFLECTION OF NEBULA.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: GAMORA
SPEECH.LINE: I don’t understand. Two Nebulas? Thanos walks into the hologram, studying the faces.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THANOS
SPEECH.LINE: No. The same Nebula. From two different times. (to Ebony Maw) Set course for Morag. And scan the duplicate’s memories. (beat) I want to see everything... 80 81

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FRIGGA
SPEECH.LINE: What are you doing?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Mother! What? Nothing. Hello.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FRIGGA
SPEECH.LINE: You’re better off leaving the sneaking to your brother. (re. his bathrobe) What are you wearing?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: I always wear this. It’s one of my favorites.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FRIGGA
SPEECH.LINE: And what’s wrong with your eye?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Oh, that. You remember the...Battle of Harokin. I took a...broadsword to the face? He trails off, at a loss, staring at his dead mom. Frigga gently lays her hand on his cheek...READING HIM.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FRIGGA
SPEECH.LINE: Oh. You’re not the Thor I know at all, are you?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Yes, I am-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FRIGGA
SPEECH.LINE: I was raised by witches, boy. I see with more than eyes, you know that. (eyeing him) I can see the future hasn’t been kind to you, has it?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: I didn’t say I was from the future... 81 82

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FRIGGA
SPEECH.LINE: Thor... Frigga gives her son a stern, “don’t lie to me” look. Thor stares at his mom a long moment. Then, he cracks:

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: I’m totally from the future.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FRIGGA
SPEECH.LINE: Yes, you are.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: I need to talk to you.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FRIGGA
SPEECH.LINE: We can talk. Frigga GRABS Thor by the cloak and yanks him away.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: ...and then it was done. His head over there. Body over there. And me in the middle. Just an idiot with an axe.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FRIGGA
SPEECH.LINE: You’re no idiot. You’re here, aren’t you? Seeking counsel from the smartest person in Asgard?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Yeah, I guess.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FRIGGA
SPEECH.LINE: An idiot, no. A failure, absolutely. 82 83

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: That’s a little harsh-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FRIGGA
SPEECH.LINE: Quite a colossal one, by the sound of it.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Okay, maybe just stop talking.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FRIGGA
SPEECH.LINE: And you know what that makes you? Just like everyone else.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: I’m not supposed to be like everyone else, though.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FRIGGA
SPEECH.LINE: Everyone fails at “who they’re supposed to be,” Thor. The measure of a person, of a hero, is how well they succeed at being who they are. Thor stares at her, biting back emotions.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: I’ve really missed you, Mum.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROCKET
SPEECH.LINE: I got it I got it I got it! A TROOP OF EINHERJAR CHASE AFTER HIM.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Mum, I have to tell you something-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FRIGGA
SPEECH.LINE: No, son. You don’t. You’ve come to repair your future, not mine.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: But your future- 83 84

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FRIGGA
SPEECH.LINE: Is none of my business. Thor stares at her, torn. THEN ROCKET RACES INTO THE ROOM.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROCKET
SPEECH.LINE: (to Frigga) Hi. You must be Mom. (to Thor, re. the device) I got the thing. Come on, we gotta move- Thor looks to Frigga.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: I wish we had more time-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FRIGGA
SPEECH.LINE: This was a gift. Now, go be the man you’re meant to be. (beat) And eat a salad. Thor smiles. He and Rocket activate their time suits.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROCKET
