SPEECH.LINE: Three...two-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: No. Wait. THOR DRAMATICALLY HOLDS OUT HIS HAND. A long moment passes.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROCKET
SPEECH.LINE: What am I looking at?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FRIGGA
SPEECH.LINE: Sometimes it takes a second. Then...MJOLNIR SAILS INTO HER SON’S HAND. She grins, proud.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: (relieved) Still worthy. Mother and son look at each other for the last time. THOR (CONT'D) Goodbye, Mum.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FRIGGA
SPEECH.LINE: Goodbye, Son. THEN, WHOOSH! THOR AND ROCKET DISAPPEAR. 84 85 Suddenly...THE PALACE RUMBLES. Frigga looks to the window, WHERE A DARK ELF WARSHIP DECLOAKS. SHE REACHES FOR A SWORD. PRELAP: “COME AND GET YOUR LOVE,” BY REDBONE.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: RHODEY
SPEECH.LINE: So, he’s an idiot.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: Yes. Quill spins, arms out, eyes shut. When the horizon finally settles...he sees A METAL MAN STANDING THERE WAITING FOR HIM.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: QUILL
SPEECH.LINE: Oh, fu- BAM! RHODEY DECKS QUILL IN THE FACE. Quill drops, out cold.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: RHODEY
SPEECH.LINE: Sorry about that. I know you guys were teammates and everything.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: Do you hear me complaining? Nebula rifles through Quill’s sack. She pulls out AN ELECTRONIC LOCK PICK.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: RHODEY
SPEECH.LINE: What is that?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: The tool of a thief. Come on. They set out toward the RUINED CITY.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: RHODEY
SPEECH.LINE: Hang on. This would be about the time the spikes come out, you know, with the skeletons still on them?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: What are you talking about?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: RHODEY
SPEECH.LINE: I’m just saying, when you break into a place called, “The Temple of the Power Stone”, there are usually... Ahead, they see...THE POWER STONE ORB HOVERING ABOVE ITS PEDESTAL, SURROUNDED BY A WEB OF LASER THREADS. RHODEY (CONT'D) Traps and stuff. (Nebula steps inside) Okay, don’t say I didn’t warn you. Rhodey scans the laser web, strategizing. RHODEY (CONT'D) These are photovoltaic lasers on a constantly shifting matrix. Gonna be damn near impossible to neutralize unless we- SUDDENLY, NEBULA REACHES HER CYBERNETIC ARM THROUGH THE WEB. SHE GRABS THE ORB...BUT THE WEB GRIPS HER, FRYING HER ARM. She pulls out the orb, but sees Rhodey staring at HER BLACKENED CLAW.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: I wasn’t always like this. He sees actual emotion somewhere inside her. Favor his exoskeletal leg braces as he softens.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: RHODEY
SPEECH.LINE: Yeah, me either. I guess we do the best with what we’ve got, huh? SHE HANDS HIM THE ORB WITH JUST THE GHOST OF A SMILE. RHODEY (CONT'D) Let’s get out of here. Place gives me the creeps. Sync up. Three... two...one... 86 (MORE) 87 RHODEY TAPS HIS CUFF, SHRINKING AWAY. Nebula goes for hers...BUT HER EYES ROLL BACK. SHE COLLAPSES, SEIZING VIOLENTLY, THEN GOING STILL. Her eyes snap open, projecting a hologram of...THANOS. THANOS (HOLO) What’s wrong?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: GAMORA
SPEECH.LINE: What did you do to them?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THANOS
SPEECH.LINE: Nothing. Yet. (piecing it together) (MORE) 87 THANOS (CONT'D) 88 They’re not trying to stop something I’m going to do in our time. They’re trying to undo something I’ve already done in theirs.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: GAMORA
SPEECH.LINE: (uneasy) The stones.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THANOS
SPEECH.LINE: I found them all. I won. Tipped the cosmic scales to balance.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: EBONY MAW
SPEECH.LINE: Sire. This is your future?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THANOS
SPEECH.LINE: My destiny. He stares, mind whirling. He nods. THE MEMORY RESUMES. RHODEY (HOLO) He’s lying. NEBULA (O.S.) My father is many things. A liar is not one of them. THANOS (HOLO) Thank you, daughter. Perhaps I’ve treated you too- WHUMP. THOR CUTS OFF THANOS’ HEAD. THE VIEW LINGERS AS “NEBULA” STARES AT HER DEAD FATHER. THANOS STUDIES HIS SEVERED HEAD...AND SMILES. THANOS (CONT'D) And that is destiny fulfilled. Gamora stares, torn. But Ebony Maw fumes on Thanos’ behalf.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: EBONY MAW
SPEECH.LINE: Sire. Your daughter is a traitor. EBONY MAW GESTURES: CABLES WRAP AROUND NEBULA’S NECK. SHE AWAKENS, PANICKED. She looks up at Thanos.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BAD NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: (choking) No. Please, father. That’s not me. I would never betray you. Please- THANOS (CONT'D) 88 89 Thanos UNWRAPS the cord. He touches his daughter’s face.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THANOS
SPEECH.LINE: Ssh, child. I know. And you’ll have the chance to prove it...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: He knows...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: We’ve got a problem. TIME CUT: STEVE huddles with TONY and SCOTT.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: How could you lose it?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: What do you want? I got hit in the head with a Hulk! 89 90

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: You said we only had one shot. This was our shot. We shot it. It was six stones or nothing! Six stones-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: You’re not helping-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: You ruined the Time Heist!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Okay, okay, Loki’s from Asgard, he’s comfortable there. Knows the restaurants. It’s a safe bet he visits home. If we can just grab This-Thor and explain the situation, he and I can fly-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Loki could be anywhere in the universe. We’d be old men before we found him. As Steve and Scott debate, MOVE IN ON TONY, MIND WHIRLING... STEVE (CONT'D) What other options did we have on the Tesseract?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: Whoa, whoa. We don’t have any other options. We can’t go to any other times. No do-overs! We’ve only got one particle left, each. Use it now, that’s it, bye-bye, we don’t come home.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: But if we don’t try, nobody else comes home, either.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: I got it! There’s another way to re-take the Tesseract, and acquire new particles. (to Steve) Military installation, Garden State. Steve eyes Tony, BEGINNING TO UNDERSTAND. 90 91

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: When were they both there?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: I have a vaguely exact idea.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: How vague?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: Hang on, what’s in New Jersey?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: I know they were there, and I know how I know. STEVE STUDIES TONY A LONG MOMENT...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Looks like we’re improvising.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: Wait! What are you improvising? STEVE HANDS SCOTT THE STAFF.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Scott, take this back to the Compound.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: All right, suits on. Try these coordinates. 04-07-19-70...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: Steve- Cap- Captain America, if you do this and he’s wrong...you’re not coming back. Steve and Tony let the weight of that sink in. He’s right. Even so, Tony turns to Steve.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: You trust me?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: I do. THEY STARE AT EACH OTHER, THEN...CLICK. THEY BOTH HIT THEIR CUFFS. TONY AND STEVE SHRINK TO NOTHING... 91 92

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STAN LEE
SPEECH.LINE: Make love, not war, baby! He roars off, passing A FADED SIGN: “U.S. ARMY - CAMP LEHIGH - BIRTHPLACE OF CAPTAIN AMERICA.” MOVE INTO THE BASE... TONY (O.S.) You weren’t actually born here, right?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: The idea of me was.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: (looking around) All right. If I was SHIELD and I wanted to hide my quasi-fascistic black site, where would I hide it?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: In plain sight. Steve nods at A MAN IN A GRAY SUIT approaching a building, “MUNITIONS.” He opens the door with a retro-tech PUNCH CARD. TONY TOUCHES HIS GLASSES: HE X-RAYS INTO THE GROUND, ILLUMINATING...TWENTY FLOORS OF SECRET, UNDERGROUND BASE.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Good luck with that mission, Captain.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Good luck with your project, Doctor. Tony ducks out. The doors close. The Agent turns to Steve.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FEMALE SHIELD AGENT
SPEECH.LINE: You new here?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Not exactly.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Come on, you little hexahedron, where are you hiding? Finally, he spots A HIGH TECH SAFE. He grabs a briefcase, then NANOS A GAUNTLET, FRYING THE SAFE’S LOCK. It opens revealing...THE TESSERACT. Tony smiles. TONY (CONT'D) You may not know it now, but someday you’re going to be a real pain-in-the-ass. Just then...THE ARCHIVE DOOR OPENS. HOWARD STARK (O.S.) Hey, Arnim, you in here? TONY LOCKS THE CUBE IN THE BRIEFCASE JUST BEFORE... HOWARD STARK (49) APPEARS, carrying ROSES AND A CAN OF SAUERKRAUT. TONY STARES, STUNNED. HOWARD STARK (CONT'D) Hey, I’m looking for Dr. Zola. You seen him?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: No. Haven’t seen a soul. 93 94 Tony stands in front of his father, overwhelmed. Howard looks at him, a bit suspicious.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: HOWARD STARK
SPEECH.LINE: I know you? From his pocket, TONY GENERATES A BADGE OUT OF NANO-TECH. He holds it out.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: No, sir. Just visiting from MIT.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: HOWARD STARK
SPEECH.LINE: That so? Got a name?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Howard...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: HOWARD STARK
SPEECH.LINE: Easy to remember-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Potts.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: HOWARD STARK
SPEECH.LINE: I’m Howard Stark. (shaking hands) You seem a little green around the gills, Potts. Need some air?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: That’d be swell. Tony distractedly walks away, leaving the briefcase.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: HOWARD STARK
SPEECH.LINE: Need the briefcase? PRE-LAP A RINGING PHONE...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: HANK PYM
SPEECH.LINE: Maybe I’m confused. Isn’t that your job? STEVE (OVER PHONE) It’s just...sir, the box is glowing. And to be honest, a couple of our mail guys aren’t feeling great-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: HANK PYM
SPEECH.LINE: They didn’t open it, did they?!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Sauerkraut and a bouquet...big night planned? 95 96

SPEECH.SPEAKER: HOWARD STARK
SPEECH.LINE: (lifting one at a time) My wife’s expecting. And too much time at the office. Tony puzzles the dates out in his head...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Congratulations.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: HOWARD STARK
SPEECH.LINE: Thanks.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: How far along is she?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: HOWARD STARK
SPEECH.LINE: Gee, I suppose... (indicating) ...this far. She’s at the point where she can’t stand the sound of my chewing. So I guess I’ll be eating in the pantry again.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: I have a little girl. TONY SMILES. He’s talking about the man-he’s-talking-to’s granddaughter, fifty years before she’s born.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: HOWARD STARK
SPEECH.LINE: A girl would be nice. Less chance she’d turn out exactly like me.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Would that be so bad?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: HOWARD STARK
SPEECH.LINE: Let’s just say the greater good hasn’t always outweighed my own self interest. The elevator doors open.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FEMALE SHIELD AGENT
SPEECH.LINE: No. But I have an eye for this. Something looked fishy. M.P. Describe ‘fishy’.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FEMALE SHIELD AGENT
SPEECH.LINE: One of them had a hippie beard. M.P. We talking Bee Gees or Mungo Jerry?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FEMALE SHIELD AGENT
SPEECH.LINE: Definitely Mungo Jerry. M.P. (over walkie-talkie) This is Chesler. We need every available agent to sub-level 6. We have a potential breach. Steve ducks through the nearest door...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PEGGY CARTER
SPEECH.LINE: So, send them in. 97 98

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MALE AGENT
SPEECH.LINE: They’re trying, ma’am, but Braddock’s unit has been stopped by lightning strikes.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PEGGY CARTER
SPEECH.LINE: Oh, for the love of- I’ll find the weather projections. You call Braddock and tell him to shelter in place. Assuming he’s bright enough to come out of the rain. MALE AGENT (O.S.) Yes, ma’am. Steve stares at her from the darkness, STUNNED. Peggy rifles through a file cabinet.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PEGGY CARTER
SPEECH.LINE: Here we are... She flips through a file, reading. In the darkness behind her, Steve approaches. Peggy reads something disturbing. PEGGY CARTER (CONT'D) Crikey O’Reilly. (calling out) Sergeant? Hang up and call Air Command. Braddock needs back up, immediately.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MALE AGENT
SPEECH.LINE: Ma’am?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PEGGY CARTER
SPEECH.LINE: Those aren’t lightning strikes he’s looking at... She slaps the file closed and hurries out. Steve stares after her a long moment.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Got any names, yet?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: HOWARD STARK
SPEECH.LINE: If it’s a boy, my wife likes Elmonzo. 98 99

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: You might let that stew a while. You’ve got time.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: HOWARD STARK
SPEECH.LINE: What are you, couple years older than me?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Yeah. I guess.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: HOWARD STARK
SPEECH.LINE: Let me ask you a question. When your kid was born...were you nervous?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Wildly.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: HOWARD STARK
SPEECH.LINE: Did you feel qualified? Like you had any idea how to successfully operate that thing?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: I pieced it together as I went along. I thought about what my dad did...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: HOWARD STARK
SPEECH.LINE: My old man never met a problem he couldn’t solve with a belt.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: I tried to hold onto the good stuff. Dad dropped the odd pearl, here and there.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: HOWARD STARK
SPEECH.LINE: Like what?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: “No amount of money ever bought a second of time.”

SPEECH.SPEAKER: HOWARD STARK
SPEECH.LINE: That’s good. Smart guy.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: He did his best. 99 100

SPEECH.SPEAKER: HOWARD STARK
SPEECH.LINE: I tell you, this kid’s not even here yet, but there’s nothing I wouldn’t do for him. Tony takes this in, GRATIFIED. Just then...EDWIN JARVIS (56) opens the limo door. HOWARD STARK (CONT'D) Besides, if I fall down on the fathering job, old Jarvis is ready to pick up the slack. Isn’t that right?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: EDWIN JARVIS
SPEECH.LINE: Indeed, sir. I shall endeavor to teach the lad the rudiments of judo. Tony smiles at his old friend. As Jarvis gets in the car, Tony notices...STEVE WAITING BEHIND A JEEP. TIME TO GO. Howard turns to shake Tony’s hand.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: HOWARD STARK
SPEECH.LINE: Well, good to meet you, Potts.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: You’re going to do fine, Howard.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: HOWARD STARK
SPEECH.LINE: Thanks. See you around?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Count on it... As he gets into his car, Howard looks to Jarvis.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: HOWARD STARK
SPEECH.LINE: Have we met him before?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: EDWIN JARVIS
SPEECH.LINE: We’ve met a lot of people, sir.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: HOWARD STARK
SPEECH.LINE: Seems very familiar. (beat) Weird beard.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BAD NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: You’re weak.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: I’m you-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BAD NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: Shut up! BAD NEBULA PUNCHES GOOD NEBULA DOWN. GOOD NEBULA GROANS AS BAD NEBULA RIPS OFF HER TIME-SPACE GPS. THEN GAMORA ENTERS. Nebula softens, taking in her (once dead) sister.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: You could stop this. You know you want to. (off Gamora’s look) Did you see what happens in the future? Thanos finds the Soul Stone. MOVE IN ON GAMORA, WHEELS TURNING... NEBULA (CONT'D) You want to know how he does that? You want to know what he does to you-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BAD NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: ENOUGH! BAD NEBULA SMACKS HER THE HARDEST YET, THEN LEANS IN WITH A JAGGED INSTRUMENT OF TORTURE. BAD NEBULA (CONT'D) You disgust me...but that doesn’t mean you’re useless. SHE PRIES OFF THE ORANGE PANEL FROM GOOD NEBULA’S HEAD. Gamora takes in this new development...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BAD NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: How do I look?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CLINT BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: Under different circumstances, this would be totally awesome.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CLINT BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: Really starting to regret my choice here.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Yeah. I’m gonna bet the raccoon didn’t have to climb a mountain.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CLINT BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: I don’t think technically he’s a raccoon...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Whatever. He eats garbage- 102 103 THEY HEAR SOMETHING. THEY WHIRL, WEAPONS UP. A HOODED FIGURE APPROACHES.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: HOODED FIGURE
SPEECH.LINE: I assure you, you have nothing to fear from me.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CLINT BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: Creepy.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: HOODED FIGURE
SPEECH.LINE: Welcome Natasha, daughter of Ivan. Clint, son of Edith.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CLINT BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: Creepier.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Who are you?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: RED SKULL
SPEECH.LINE: Consider me a guide. To you, and to all who seek the Soul Stone.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Great. You show us where it is, and we’ll be on our way. The figure removes his hood, revealing...THE RED SKULL.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: RED SKULL
SPEECH.LINE: Oh, liebchen. If only it were that easy...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: RED SKULL
SPEECH.LINE: What you seek lies in front of you. As does what you fear.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: The Stone is down there?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: RED SKULL
SPEECH.LINE: For one of you. For the other... (smiling it away) The Stone demands a sacrifice. In order to take it, you must leave behind that which you love. 103 104 SKULL POINTS A BONY FINGER DOWN THE WELL. RED SKULL (CONT'D) A soul for a soul. Natasha and Clint stare down the well, stunned. TIME CUT: RED SKULL STARES DOWN THE WELL, robes whipping in the wind. CLINT BARTON (O.S.) Maybe he’s full of shit. FIFTY FEET AWAY, AT THE MONOLITHS, NATASHA AND CLINT HUDDLE.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: I don’t think so.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CLINT BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: Why, because he knew your daddy’s name?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: I didn’t. (off his look) Thanos left here with the stone, and without his daughter. You really think that’s a coincidence? They both look out at the well, heavy. NATASHA (CONT'D) (under her breath) Whatever it takes...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CLINT BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: (under his breath) Whatever it takes... Natasha goes to Clint, resolved.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: If we don’t get the stone, billions of people are going to stay dead.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CLINT BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: Then I guess we both know who it has to be.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Yeah. Guess we do. They take each other’s hand. A long goodbye beat. Except... 104 105

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CLINT BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: I’m starting to think we don’t mean the same person.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: For the last five years, I’ve been trying to do one thing -- get to right here. This is all it’s been about. Bringing everybody back.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CLINT BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: Do not get all decent on me-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: You think I want to do it? I’m trying to save your life, you idiot-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CLINT BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: And I don’t want you to. (beat) Nat. You know what I’ve done. What I am now. Your life’s worth ten of mine-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: I don’t judge people by their worst mistakes-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CLINT BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: Maybe you should-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: You didn’t. That stops him. He looks in her eyes, then down, giving in.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CLINT BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: You’re a pain in my ass, you know that? She relaxes for the briefest moment. Just then, CLINT SWEEPS OUT HER LEGS, PINNING HER DOWN. CLINT BARTON (CONT'D) Tell my family I love them. SHE REVERSES, SENDING HIM TUMBLING.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Tell them yourself. SHE FIRES A WIDOW’S BITE INTO HIS CHEST AND MAKES A BREAK FOR THE CLIFF. SHE’S HALFWAY THERE WHEN... 105 --- 106 BOOM! AN EXPLODING ARROW KNOCKS HER OFF HER FEET. Clint races past her...leaping off edge of the cliff. Just as he falls... NATASHA TACKLES HIM IN MID-AIR. They drop, but NATASHA SHOOTS HER GRAPPLING LINE INTO THE CLIFF. THEY SLAM INTO THE CLIFFSIDE. She attaches the other end of her grappling line to Clint’s belt...saving his life. She slides, but he reaches out and grabs her...saving hers.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CLINT BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: Damn you. They hang there a long, terrible moment. CLINT’S GRASP STARTS TO LOOSEN. Finally, she looks him in the eye.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: Let me go.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CLINT BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: No. Please no... The two friends stare at each other, a lifetime between them.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NATASHA
SPEECH.LINE: It’s okay...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CLINT BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: Natasha, no- Then Natasha Romanoff kicks off the cliff wall, yanking out of Clint’s grasp. She falls... Clint dangles from the grappling hook, staring down, helpless, stifling his scream. WHOOSH! THE WHOLE WORLD GOES WHITE.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: RHODEY
SPEECH.LINE: Are you telling me that actually worked?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: Did we get them all? CLINT DROPS TO HIS KNEES. Steve turns, concerned.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Clint? Are you okay? Clint stares, haunted. SMART HULK realizes...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: Where’s Nat? (everyone stares) WHERE’S NAT?! Clint looks up at them, eyes glassy.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Do we know if she had family?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Yeah. Us. Thor turns, thrown.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Why are you doing that?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: I’m just asking a question- 107 108

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Why are we talking as if she’s dead? We have the stones. Bring her back. C’mon, stop this shit. Clint squeezes away tears.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CLINT BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: We can’t get her back.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: What’s he talking about? Of course, we can.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CLINT BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: It can’t be undone. That’s why.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: No offense, but you’re...a very earthly being. We’re talking about space magic, here. “Can’t” seems a little definitive, don’t you think?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CLINT BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: Well, I know I’m a little outside my pay grade here, but, she still isn’t here, is she?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: That’s my point-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CLINT BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: It can’t be undone. At least that’s what the red, floating guy said. But why don’t you go talk to him, okay? Why don’t you grab your hammer and fly to that place and talk to him. IT CAN’T BE UNDONE. (beat) It was supposed to be me. She sacrificed her life for that goddamn stone. She bet her life on it. That lands heavily on all of them. A moment passes. THEN SMART HULK HURLS THE BENCH INTO THE WATER. It skips across the surface like a stone.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: She’s not coming back. We have to make it worth it. We have to. 108 109

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: We will. PULL BACK, LEAVING OUR MOURNERS IN TABLEAU...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROCKET
SPEECH.LINE: All right. The glove’s ready. Question is, who’s gonna snap their freaking fingers? Everyone stares a beat. Then, THOR REACHES FOR THE GAUNTLET.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: I’ll do it.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Whoa, whoa, what are you doing-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Thor, we haven’t decided who’s putting that on.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Oh. Were all of you just waiting for the right opportunity?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROCKET
SPEECH.LINE: Maybe I was getting around to it-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: We should at least discuss it- 109 110

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Staring at the thing isn’t going to bring everybody back, is it? Look, I’m the strongest Avenger. It’s my responsibility. Fate wills it so.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Hold on, hold on-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Stop it! Let me do this. Let me do something good. Something right-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: That thing is channeling enough energy to light up a continent. You’re in no condition-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: What do you think is coursing through my veins right now?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: RHODEY
SPEECH.LINE: Cheez Whiz?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Lightning. Smart Hulk steps toward the Gauntlet.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: Lightning won’t help you, pal. It’s gotta be me. (approaching) You saw what those stones did to Thanos. They almost killed him. None of you could survive.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: And how do we know you can?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: We don’t. But the radiation’s mostly gamma. (beat) It’s like I was made for this...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Good to go?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: Let’s do it.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Okay, remember, everyone Thanos snapped away five years ago, you’re just bringing them back...to today. Don’t change anything from the last five years. Got it?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: Got it. PAN AROUND as the Avengers ready themselves: STEVE steps forward, shield on his arm. SCOTT deploys his helmet. RHODEY readies his repulsors. ROCKET covers his raccoon junk and hides behind THOR. TONY armors up, then nanos a shield to protect CLINT beside him.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Friday, why don’t you go ahead and activate Barn Door Protocol? STEEL DOORS SLIDE SHUT ALL AROUND THE WORKSHOP. FINALLY, SMART HULK HOLDS UP THE GAUNTLET.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: (under his breath) Everybody’s coming home... HE SLOWLY SLIPS HIS HAND IN THE GLOVE. SUDDENLY, HE SPASMS, TAKING IN THE POWER AS THANOS DID IN ML1. HE STRUGGLES.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: What’s happening? Take it off, take if off!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Bruce, you okay?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Talk to me, Banner. 111 112

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: I’m...okay... THEN SMART HULK REACHES OUT HIS HAND...AND SNAPS HIS FINGERS. CRAAAACK! THE STONES FLARE. A BRIGHT SURGE OF ENERGY RACES UP SMART HULK’S ARM. HE ROARS AS HIS EYES BLAZE GREEN. A BLAST WHITES OUT THE SCREEN.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Bruce!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Don’t move him! Then THE BLAST DOORS OPEN, revealing the sound of...CHIRPING. SCOTT walks toward the courtyard. Smart Hulk’s eyes clear. He grasps Steve’s arm.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: Did it work? They pause, as if it only just now occurred to them. JUST THEN...A CELL PHONE BUZZES. 112 113 A STUNNED CLINT TURNS AND APPROACHES HIS PHONE. On the home screen, we see A PHOTO OF HIS WIFE: “LAURA CALLING.” CLINT FINALLY PUTS THE PHONE TO HIS EAR.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CLINT BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: Honey? AT THE WINDOW, SCOTT STARES AT A BIRD FEEDER. DOZENS OF CARDINALS AND FINCHES NIBBLE ON THE SEED.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: Guys, I think it- BOOM! THE BUILDING EXPLODES. DEBRIS SWALLOWS THE CAMERA.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THANOS
SPEECH.LINE: So this is the future. Well done. She tears off THE ORANGE HEAD-PLATE.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BAD NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: Thank you, Father. They suspected nothing.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THANOS
SPEECH.LINE: The arrogant never do. 113 114 Thanos takes off his helmet, staring up at the crater’s edge. THANOS (CONT'D) Go. Find the stones. Bring them to me.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BAD NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: What will you do?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THANOS
SPEECH.LINE: Wait.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: RHODEY
SPEECH.LINE: Canopy! Canopy! Rhodey’s suit RATCHETS OPEN. HE HAULS HIMSELF FREE to see...ROCKET TRAPPED UNDER RUBBLE. AS HE CRAWLS TO HIM... THE CEILING RUMBLES. SMART HULK WAVERS, MUSCLES QUIVERING. RHODEY (INTO COM) (CONT'D) Mayday! Tony. Cap. Does anybody hear me?! HE FINALLY REACHES ROCKET. Rocket wheezes, in pain. RHODEY (CONT'D) Hang on! RHODEY WEDGES A PIECE OF REBAR INTO THE DEBRIS. HE HEAVES, finally managing to lever it off of Rocket. THEN... THE CRACKED CEILING GIVES WAY. A MILLION GALLONS OF RIVER WATER RUSH IN. RHODEY TRIES TO KEEP HIS HEAD ABOVE WATER. RHODEY (INTO COM) (CONT'D) Mayday! Mayday! We are taking on water!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: Wait, what...? REVEAL, TINY SCOTT LYING IN THE RUINS OF THE ARMORY...ON THE IRON PATRIOT HELMET. ROCKET (OVER COM) Tell ‘em to...hurry...asses up- RHODEY (OVER COM) ...trapped...drowning...no time... Scott jumps to his feet. SCOTT LANG (INTO COM) No! Wait, I’m here! Scott spots WATER TRICKLING THROUGH THE CRACKED FLOOR.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: WATER DRIPS FROM A HOLE IN THE ROOF OF AN ACCESS
SPEECH.LINE: TUNNEL...ONTO CLINT BARTON, LYING FACEDOWN. He groans. He opens his hand to find HIS CELLPHONE: HIS WIFE SMILES ON THE SCREEN. “LAURA, ONE MISSED CALL.” Clint stares, amazed. He winces, finding he’s been lying atop...THE GAUNTLET. It’s bashed out of shape, BUT ALL SIX STONES STILL GLEAM. CLINT BARTON (INTO COM) Cap? Stark? Anyone? STATIC. Then, he hears...A SCRAPING SOUND, TALONS ON CEMENT. He peers down a darkened tunnel, then unshoulders his bow. HE LOOSES A FLARE ARROW, revealing... DOZENS OF OUTRIDERS SCRABBLING ALONG THE WALLS AND CEILING. CLINT GRABS THE GAUNTLET AND RUNS. THE CREATURES GIVE CHASE.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.RECEIVER: WATER DRIPS FROM A HOLE IN THE ROOF OF AN ACCESS
SPEECH.LINE: You lose this again, I’m keeping it.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: What happened?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Told you. We messed with time. Time messed back. Woozy, Steve follows Tony through the ruins of the lab.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Where are the others?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: I read life signs, maybe 800 feet down, but it’s hard to tell. They reach the edge of the crater where THOR LOOKS DOWN AT...THANOS. Sitting on a rock. Waiting. TONY (CONT'D) What’s he been doing?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Absolutely nothing. The three of them stare a long moment. Then, as if sensing them, Thanos turns his head...AND LOOKS THEIR WAY.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Son of a bitch.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Yeah.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Where are the stones?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Somewhere under all of this. All I know is...he doesn’t have ‘em.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: So we keep it that way. That lands. This is their chance.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: You know it’s a trap. TONY DEPLOYS HIS ARMOR. 116 (MORE) 117

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Don’t think I care.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Just so we’re all in agreement. Thor holds out his hand: MJOLNIR FLIES INTO IT. He holds out his other hand: STORMBREAKER SLAPS INTO HIS PALM. CRACK! LIGHTNING STRIKES AS HE’S COVERED IN CAPE AND ARMOR. THOR (CONT'D) Let’s kill him properly this time. STEVE TIGHTENS HIS SHIELD, LEADING THEM INTO THE CRATER...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THANOS
SPEECH.LINE: You could not live with your own failure. And where did that bring you? Right back to me. TONY APPROACHES, WARY, AS IF SNEAKING UP ON A RABID DOG. STEVE AND THOR FAN OUT ON EITHER SIDE. THANOS (CONT'D) I thought by eliminating half of life, the other half would thrive. But you’ve shown me that’s impossible. (beat) Life clings to the past with bloody fingernails. As long as there are those who remember what was, there will be those unable to accept what can be. They will resist.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Yep. We’re all kinds of stubborn.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THANOS
SPEECH.LINE: I’m thankful. Because now I know what I must do. Thanos reaches for his helmet. THANOS (CONT'D) I will shred this universe down to its last atom. (MORE) 117 THANOS (CONT'D) 118 And then, with the stones you’ve collected for me, create a new one, teeming with life that knows not what it has lost, but only what it has been given. A grateful universe.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Born out of blood. Thanos studies Steve as if seeing him for the first time.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THANOS
SPEECH.LINE: They’ll never know it. THANOS DRAWS A BLADE OFF HIS BACK, TOWERING OVER THEM. THANOS (CONT'D) Because you won’t be alive to tell them. Tony glances over at Steve. Ready? Steve nods... JUST AS THOR CHARGES THANOS. WHAM! ALL THREE AVENGERS ATTACK, USING THEIR SKILLS IN CONCERT. THANOS STUMBLES, ON HIS HEELS. THE HEROES PUNISH HIM, RELENTLESS. PULL UP THROUGH THE HAZE, TO THE SANCTUARY-2...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: What do you want? GAMORA STEPS INTO THE CELL. THE TWO SISTERS FROM DIFFERENT ERAS STARE AT EACH OTHER.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: GAMORA
SPEECH.LINE: In the future...what happens to you and me?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: I try to kill you. Several times. But, eventually...we become friends. We become sisters.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: GAMORA
SPEECH.LINE: That’s hard to believe. THANOS (CONT'D) 118 119

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: A lot of things that happen will be hard to believe. Gamora nearly smiles. She takes a long look at Nebula. Finally...SHE HOLDS OUT HER HAND.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: GAMORA
SPEECH.LINE: Come on. We can still stop him. Nebula takes a deciding moment. Then SHE GRABS GAMORA’S HAND. One sister pulls the other to her feet.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: Rhodey. Rocket. Get out of here. Save yourselves. ROCKET SURFACES FROM BELOW, GASPING.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROCKET
SPEECH.LINE: No good. Couldn’t even...find a hole...small enough to abandon you through. Suddenly, Smart Hulk snarls in pain as THE CEILING DROPS A FOOT. His legs buckle as he struggles against the weight. Finally he sets his jaw...AND STRAIGHTENS HIS LEGS.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: AAARRRGH!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CLINT BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: Oh, hey. I know you. She gently takes the Gauntlet. BAD NEBULA (INTO COM) Father. I have the stones.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CLINT BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: What- Clint tries to get up, but Nebula puts a boot in his chest and A BLASTER TO HIS HEAD... GAMORA (O.S.) Stop. COVERING CLINT, BAD NEBULA TURNS TO SEE...GAMORA, GUN RAISED.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BAD NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: You’re betraying us?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: GAMORA
SPEECH.LINE: Not you. GOOD NEBULA steps from the shadows, hands raised, placating. Bad Nebula stares at her future self. 120 121

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: You don’t have to do this.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BAD NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: I am this.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: GAMORA
SPEECH.LINE: No. You’re not. Good Nebula takes a tiny step forward. She taps her head.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: You’ve seen what we become-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: GAMORA
SPEECH.LINE: Sister, listen to her-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BAD NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: Shut up. You’re a traitor!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: You can change. Bad Nebula struggles, her face a twisted grimace.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BAD NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: He won’t let me. BAD NEBULA FIRES AT GAMORA, JUST AS GOOD NEBULA DRAWS A GUN AND SHOOTS HER DOWN. BAD NEBULA DROPS. Good Nebula stares at her dead younger self, conflicted. Clint picks up the gauntlet, very confused.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CLINT BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: I’m not even gonna ask.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THANOS SNATCHES TONY BY THE ANKLE AND USES HIM AS A SHIELD
SPEECH.LINE: AGAINST THE ONCOMING HAMMER. WHACK! 121 122 MJOLNIR PLOWS INTO THE DIRT. TONY GOES TUMBLING, OUT COLD. TONY’S HUD: FRIDAY TRIES TO REVIVE HIM. FRIDAY (O.S.) Boss? Wake up!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: RHODEY
SPEECH.RECEIVER: THANOS SNATCHES TONY BY THE ANKLE AND USES HIM AS A SHIELD
SPEECH.LINE: See you on the other side, man. They take a last breath, THEN THE WATER HITS THE CEILING.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: I...knew...it... STEVE ATTACKS, CRACKING THANOS IN THE JAW. THANOS TUMBLES. BEFORE THE TITAN CAN GET UP, STEVE CALLS DOWN THE LIGHTNING AND SENDS IT CRACKLING INTO THANOS’ BODY. Steve leaps, trying to finish Thanos off...BUT THANOS ROLLS ASIDE, HEAD-BUTTING STEVE BACKWARDS. THANOS GETS TO HIS FEET, A FAINT SMILE ON HIS FACE. HE WHIPS OFF HIS HELMET AND ATTACKS STEVE WITH HIS BLADE. BLOW AFTER BLOW. IT’S ALL STEVE CAN DO TO GET HIS SHIELD UP. 122 123 THANOS HACKS THE SHIELD TO PIECES, FINALLY KNOCKING STEVE ACROSS THE FIELD. Steve lies beaten, half a shield still attached to his arm.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THANOS
SPEECH.LINE: In all my years of conquest... Thanos looks out at the tiny human struggling to stand. THANOS (CONT'D) Of violence and slaughter...it was never personal. Thanos gestures behind him as A RUMBLE ECHOES. THOUSANDS OF ALIENS RING THE LIP OF THE CRATER: THE BLACK ORDER LEADS A PLATOON OF CHITAURI, SAKAARANS, AND OUTRIDERS. THANOS (CONT'D) But I’ll tell you now, the things I’m about to do to your stubborn, annoying, little planet... Q-SHIPS, DROPSHIPS, NECROCRAFT, AND LEVIATHANS BUZZ ABOVE. THANOS (CONT'D) I’m going to enjoy it. Very, very much. Steve stares at Thanos and his army. And even in the face of such overwhelming odds...he gets to his feet. THANOS stares, almost sad, as Steve tightens the broken shield on his arm...AND STARTS WALKING TOWARD HIM. One man against thousands. All alone. But just then, Steve’s COM CRACKLES. He strains to hear. The com crackles again. We can make out A MUFFLED VOICE. MUFFLED VOICE (ON COM) -ap-...-comin-...-ot- Steve shakes his head, trying to clear it. Slowly, SOUND RETURNS...AND THE WORDS RING CLEAR: SAM WILSON (O.S.) Cap. On your left. PULL BACK...TO SEE A PORTAL OPENING IN THE DISTANCE. OUT OF IT FLIES...SAM WILSON. 123 124 Steve watches Sam soar over the field, then turns AS EVEN MORE PORTALS OPEN. FROM ONE: DR. STRANGE, PETER QUILL, DRAX, MANTIS, PETER PARKER...AND KRAGLIN AND THE RAVAGERS. FROM ANOTHER: T’CHALLA, OKOYE, SHURI, M’BAKU, WANDA, BUCKY, GROOT...AND THE WAKANDAN ARMY. FROM A THIRD: VALKYRIE, KORG, MIEK...AND AN ASGARDIAN ARMY. FROM A FOURTH: PEPPER POTTS (IN RESCUE ARMOR), HOPE VAN DYNE, AND WONG LEADING A SQUAD OF SORCERERS. THOR gets to his feet, calling Stormbreaker to his hand as...TONY regains consciousness, staring out at the cavalry. Wong and Strange quickly find each other. DR. STRANGE Is that everyone?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: WONG
SPEECH.LINE: You wanted more?! JUST THEN, THE GROUND SHAKES AND RUBBLE EXPLODES UPWARDS AS...GIANT-MAN BURSTS FROM BELOW.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: Top floor, everybody out! HE OPENS HIS HUGE HAND, RELEASING ROCKET, SMART HULK, AND RHODEY, NOW IN HIS COSMIC IRON PATRIOT ARMOR. STEVE TAKES IN HIS REINFORCEMENTS, THEN STARES OUT AT THANOS. PAN ACROSS OUR HEROES AS STEVE CALLS MJOLNIR TO HIS HAND.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Avengers...assemble. THOR LETS LOOSE A BATTLE CRY AS HE CHARGES! EVERYONE FOLLOWS SUIT AS OUR HEROES FLOOD THE FIELD. ACROSS THE WAY, THANOS SMILES AND POINTS HIS BLADE. TWO MIGHTY ARMIES RACE TOWARD EACH OTHER UNTIL...CLASH! GIANT-MAN SLUGS A LEVIATHAN IN THE JAW. DRAX launches himself onto a CULL currently choking the life out of KORG. 124 125 TONY blasts overhead. RESCUE joins him. Together, they strafe the field. STEVE and THOR fight together. Both hold out their hands. Stormbreaker returns to Steve, Mjolnir to Thor, who frowns.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: No. You take the little one. Elsewhere, TONY BATTLES SEVERAL CULLS. One knocks him into an Outrider, who’s about to rip his armor off when... THWIP. PETER PARKER webs the Outrider, yanking him into the path of...GIANT-MAN’S FOOT. SQUISH. Tony stares at Peter, emotional. They retract their helmets.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PETER PARKER
SPEECH.LINE: Mr. Stark. Holy cow, you would not believe what’s been going on. Do you remember when we were in space? And I got all dusty? I must’ve passed out, because I woke up and you weren’t there, but Dr. Strange was, and he was like, “it’s been five years, they need us.” And he started doing that yellow sparkly thing he does- But Tony just wraps his arms around him, smashing Peter’s face into his chest plate. PETER PARKER (CONT'D) (muffled) Oh. This is nice. ACROSS THE FIELD...QUILL flies, firing down on Sakaaran soldiers. One leaps off an outcropping... TACKLING QUILL INTO A WRECKED FUSELAGE, WHERE ANOTHER SAKAARAN WAITS. Quill drops one, but the other raises his weapon to strike. THEN BLAM! The Sakaaran drops dead on top of Quill. He pushes the body off to see...GAMORA, BLASTER STILL SMOKING. Quill stares, amazed.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: QUILL
SPEECH.LINE: Gamora? HE APPROACHES, OVERWHELMED, EMOTIONAL. 125 126 QUILL (CONT'D) I thought I lost you. He tenderly strokes her face...and she knees him in the nuts. Twice. He goes down, gasping. QUILL (CONT'D) You missed the first time...then you got ‘em both the second time. She stares down at him as...NEBULA JOINS HER.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: GAMORA
SPEECH.LINE: This is the one? Seriously?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: Your choices were him or a tree. ACROSS THE FIELD...CLINT RUNS WITH THE GAUNTLET, PURSUED BY A CHITAURI APE. Just before the ape tramples Clint... SAM WILSON SWOOPS IN, CUTTING THE CREATURE DOWN. Clint runs on. The heroes confer over coms.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CLINT BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: What do you want to do with this thing?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Get those stones as far away as possible!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: No! We need to send them back where they came from.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: There’s no way to send them back. Thanos destroyed our time machine.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: Hold on! (shrinking to normal size) That wasn’t our only time machine. He clicks the KEYS TO LUIS’ VAN. From a distance, we hear, “LA CUCARACHA.” Steve immediately gets it.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Does anyone see an ugly, brown van out there? ABOVE, VALKYRIE SCANS THE FIELD FROM HER PEGASUS. 126 127

SPEECH.SPEAKER: VALKYRIE
SPEECH.LINE: Yeah. But you’re not going to like where it’s parked. LUIS’ VAN SITS SURROUNDED BY THOUSANDS OF ALIENS, DEEP BEHIND ENEMY LINES. STEVE SURVEYS THE FIELD: AN ARMY STANDS BETWEEN THEM AND THE VAN, AIR AND GROUND CHOKED WITH ENEMIES. TONY (INTO COM) Scott, how long do you need to get that thing working?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: Uh, maybe ten minutes.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Get it started. We’ll get the stones to you.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: HOPE VAN DYNE
SPEECH.LINE: We’re on it, Cap. SCOTT glances at her. Cap? THEY SHRINK DOWN AND FLY AWAY. TONY FLIES UP TO DR. STRANGE, HOVERING.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Doc. You said we win one in 14 million. Is this how it goes down? DR. STRANGE If I tell you what happens, it won’t happen.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: You better be right. Tony rockets away. Strange coolly watches him go. ACROSS THE FIELD...EBONY MAW RUSHES TO THANOS.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: EBONY MAW
SPEECH.LINE: Sire, the stones! THANOS TURNS TO SEE...CLINT FIGHTING THROUGH THE HORDE, CARRYING THE GAUNTLET. A CULL HAMMERS CLINT, BUT THEN...T’CHALLA SLASHES THE CULL. T’CHALLA Clint, give it to me. 127 128 CLINT HANDS THE GAUNTLET TO T’CHALLA, WHO TUCKS IT AND RUNS. ACROSS THE FIELD...SCOTT AND HOPE FLY OVER A LONG PLATOON OF CHITAURI, TOWARD LUIS’ VAN.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: (digging around) Ignition’s broken. I’ll hotwire it-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: HOPE VAN DYNE
SPEECH.LINE: Wait, you know how to do that? Scott splices wires. Sparks fly.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: I was in prison. I know how to do a lot of things.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: WANDA
SPEECH.LINE: You took everything from me. Thanos takes THE BLADE off his back.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THANOS
SPEECH.LINE: I don’t even know who you are.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: WANDA
SPEECH.LINE: You will. WANDA UNLEASHES A STORM OF RED ENERGY, HURLING WRECKAGE AT HIM. AS THANOS FIGHTS HIS WAY THROUGH IT... T’CHALLA DIVES FOR THE FALLEN GAUNTLET. SUDDENLY...EBONY MAW MANIPULATES THE EARTH, PULLING THE GAUNTLET TOWARD HIM. T’CHALLA WRAPS HIMSELF AROUND THE GLOVE, GETTING DRAGGED. 128 129 PETER PARKER (O.S.) I GOT IT! T’CHALLA TURNS TO SEE PETER WHIZZING PAST. HE HURLS THE GAUNTLET...THWIP! Peter snatches it out of the air. HE LANDS, ONLY TO FIND HIMSELF SURROUNDED BY OUTRIDERS. PETER PARKER (CONT'D) Activate instant kill! His robotic arms slash with expert precision. ACROSS THE FIELD...WANDA LIFTS THANOS INTO THE AIR, RIPS HIS ARMOR OFF IN PIECES, THEN SLAMS HIM BACK TO THE GROUND. Thanos groans, outmatched. THANOS (INTO COM) Rain fire. Wipe them all out. CORVUS GLAIVE FIGHTS GROOT.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CORVUS GLAIVE
SPEECH.LINE: But, sire, our troops- THANOS (INTO COM) Just do it! HIGH ABOVE...THE SANCTUARY-2 DESCENDS, CANNONS OPENING UP. BELOW...WANDA looks up, raising a force field just as... THE SANCTUARY-2 FIRES DOWN WITH EVERYTHING IT HAS. SAKAARANS AND JABARI ALIKE GO FLYING AS EVERY SQUARE INCH GETS HIT. THE BARRAGE HAMMERS THE RIVERBANK. CRACKS FORM. PEPPER CUTS DOWN AN ALIEN, THEN SPOTS SOMETHING OFF SCREEN. PEPPER POTTS (INTO COM) Um, is anyone else seeing this? TONY, SMART HULK, AND GAMORA turn to see...WATER GUSHING AS THE RIVERBANK THREATENS TO COLLAPSE. SUDDENLY...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STRANGE AND WONG CONJURE TWO HUGE RUNE SHIELDS TO SHORE UP
SPEECH.LINE: THE BANK. MORE WIZARDS JOIN, CREATING A HUGE “RUNE LEVEE.” THE SANCTUARY-2 MAINTAINS ITS BARRAGE. ACROSS THE FIELD...STEVE spots PETER PARKER gradually being overwhelmed by Outriders. 129 130

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PETER PARKER
SPEECH.RECEIVER: STRANGE AND WONG CONJURE TWO HUGE RUNE SHIELDS TO SHORE UP
SPEECH.LINE: I got this...I got this...I don’t got this.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Hey, Queens! Heads up! STEVE HURLS MJOLNIR OVER THE THRONG. PETER WEBS ON...LETTING THE HAMMER PULL HIM OUT OF DANGER. A MORTAR BLAST KNOCKS HIM OUT OF THE SKY, BUT PEPPER POTTS RESCUES HIM.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PEPPER POTTS
SPEECH.LINE: Hang on, kid. I’ve got you. She drags him above the fray, then tosses him to...VALKYRIE FLYING PAST. PETER PERCHES ATOP PEGASUS.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PETER PARKER
SPEECH.LINE: Hey, nice to meet you-aaaaarg! VALKYRIE SPURS INTO HIGH GEAR, DODGING CANNON FIRE... BUT NOT FAST ENOUGH. A BLAST KNOCKS PETER TO THE GROUND. HE GASPS, COVERED IN DEBRIS, STILL CLUTCHING THE GAUNTLET. ALL AROUND THE FIELD, THE RELENTLESS BARRAGE PINS DOWN OUR HEROES. ALL HOPE IS LOST. Rocket and Groot dive for cover. Groot wraps his branches around them both.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROCKET
SPEECH.LINE: At least we’re going out together this time... SUDDENLY, EVERYTHING GOES SILENT. ROCKET PEERS OUT FROM COVER TO SEE...THE CANNONS SWIVELING UP TOWARD THE CLOUDS. SAM WILSON flies overhead.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SAM WILSON
SPEECH.LINE: What the hell is this? TONY’S HUD: TONY FLIES OVERHEAD, SEARCHING UPWARD.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: Friday, what are they firing at? FRIDAY (O.S.) Something just entered the upper atmosphere. 130 131 Rocket looks up at...A COMET HEADING STRAIGHT FOR EARTH.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: GROOT
SPEECH.LINE: (nervous) I am Groot. Rocket grins, knowing what’s coming.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROCKET
SPEECH.LINE: Just wait for it. SUDDENLY, THE COMET VEERS...RIGHT TOWARD THE SHIP. BOOM! THE COMET TEARS THROUGH THE SANCTUARY-2, RIGHT OUT THE OTHER SIDE, REVEALING...CAROL DANVERS. ROCKET (CONT'D) Oh, yeah! CAROL GLOWS BRIGHTER AS SHE GOES BINARY, ROCKETING AGAIN THROUGH THE HULL. BOOM! THE SHIP LISTS, ENGINES EXPLODING. CAROL EYES THE BATTLEFIELD, EXHAUSTED, LIGHT FADING. STEVE (OVER COM) Danvers! We’re gonna need an assist down here! CAROL DANVERS (INTO COM) (under ragged breath) Roger...Rogers...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PETER PARKER
SPEECH.LINE: Uh, hey. I’m Peter Parker.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAROL DANVERS
SPEECH.LINE: Hey, Peter Parker. You got something for me? 131 132 Peter hands it over, staring out at the approaching horde.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PETER PARKER
SPEECH.LINE: I don’t know how you’re gonna get it through all that- WANDA (O.S.) Don’t worry, kid... Peter turns to see... WANDA, OKOYE, GAMORA, NEBULA, VALKYRIE, HOPE, AND SHURI WAITING. Wanda’s hands begin to glow.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: OKOYE
SPEECH.LINE: She’s got help. Carol glances at PEPPER and MANTIS, then tucks the gauntlet under her arm AND LEADS THEM OUT. AT THE RIDGE...Thanos spots THE WOMEN OF MARVEL BLASTING THROUGH HIS TROOPS. HE TRACKS THEIR PATH TO...THE VAN. SCOTT KICKS THE REAR DOORS OPEN, EXPOSING THE QUANTUM TUNNEL.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SCOTT LANG
SPEECH.LINE: Thirty seconds! Thanos understands immediately. HE GRABS PROXIMA’S SPEAR FROM HER, AND STARTS RUNNING... ACROSS THE FIELD...EBONY MAW SENDS WANDA TUMBLING, BUT SHURI BLASTS HIM OUT OF THE SKY. CULL OBSIDIAN HAMMERS VALKYRIE, BUT NEBULA TAKES HIM OUT. CAROL KEEPS GOING, GAUNTLET TUCKED UNDER HER ARM, GETTING CLOSER AND CLOSER TO... THE VAN...WHERE THE QUANTUM TUNNEL BURSTS TO LIFE. ACROSS THE FIELD...GROUNDED HEROES LOOK UP TO SEE CAROL NOW JUST YARDS AWAY FROM THE GOAL. SHE PUTS HER HEAD DOWN, FLYING FOR ALL SHE’S WORTH. BUT JUST AS SHE REACHES THE GAPING VAN DOORS... THANOS THROWS THE SPEAR... BOOM! THE VAN EXPLODES, SENDING SCOTT AND CAROL FLYING, TAKING OUT SOME OF THE WIZARDS HOLDING BACK THE RIVER. THANOS CATCHES PROXIMA’S RETURNING SPEAR. 132 133 TIME SLOWS AS...STEVE, THOR, AND TONY SPOT...THE GAUNTLET, LYING UNGUARDED IN THE DIRT. The problem is...SO DOES THANOS. TIME RESUMES AS...THEY ALL SCRAMBLE FOR THE STONES. THEY COLLIDE. THANOS SNATCHES UP THE GAUNTLET, KICKING THOR DOWN. THANOS KNOCKS TONY ASIDE, THEN SQUEEZES THE CRUSHED GAUNTLET, POPPING IT OPEN...JUST WIDE ENOUGH TO PUT HIS HAND INSIDE. STEVE LUNGES, BUT THANOS THROTTLES HIM. FINALLY CLEAR, THANOS SLIPS ON THE GAUNTLET. BUT BEFORE HE CAN SNAP... CAROL ARRIVES. SHE GRABS THE GLOVE, PREVENTING HIM FROM CLOSING HIS FIST. HE HEADBUTTS HER...BUT SHE DOESN’T MOVE. CAROL PRESSES THANOS DOWN, BUT BEFORE HE FALLS...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THANOS PULLS THE POWER STONE FROM ITS HOUSING AND PUNCHES
SPEECH.LINE: CAROL, SENDING HER FLYING. THE FIELD GOES QUIET. NOW, NOTHING STANDS IN THANOS’ WAY. Tony gets to his knees, realizing... The Avengers are going to lose. ACROSS THE FIELD...WATER STARTS TO SPILL INTO THE CRATER. STRANGE TRIES TO HOLD IT BACK...BUT IT’S A LOSING BATTLE. He looks to Tony... Tony meets his eye. And in that moment, all Strange can do is hold up a single finger. “One.” ACROSS THE FIELD...THANOS RETURNS THE POWER STONE TO THE GAUNTLET. JUST AS THE ENERGY SURGES THROUGH HIM... TONY LUNGES FOR THE GAUNTLET IN THANOS’ HAND, NANO-CLAMPING IT IN A VISE. THANOS KNOCKS HIM ASIDE. HE LIFTS HIS HAND IN THE AIR, TRIUMPHANT.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THANOS
SPEECH.RECEIVER: THANOS PULLS THE POWER STONE FROM ITS HOUSING AND PUNCHES
SPEECH.LINE: I am...inevitable. THANOS SNAPS HIS FINGERS. But nothing happens. Confused, Thanos turns the glove over to find...THE STONES ARE GONE. He looks to see...TONY, NANO-PARTICLES SLIDING AND SHIFTING, FORMING A NEW GAUNTLET ON HIS OWN WRIST: 133 134 COMPLETE WITH SIX INFINITY STONES. POWER SURGES THROUGH TONY, EXCRUCIATING, BUT HE STILL LIFTS HIS HAND...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TONY
SPEECH.LINE: And I...am Iron Man. SNAP! WHOOSH. THE TIDAL WAVE EVAPORATES INTO MIST. ALL AROUND THE FIELD, SAKAARANS AND OUTRIDERS FOLD IN ON THEMSELVES, ATOMS DISINTEGRATING. THANOS LOOKS AROUND, WATCHING HIS TROOPS DISAPPEAR. SHIPS VANISH FROM THE SKY. CULLS, CHITAURI, ALL BLOW AWAY... LEAVING THANOS STANDING ALONE. AFTER A LONG MOMENT, HE SITS DOWN ON A ROCK...AND ACCEPTS HIS FATE. He watches as... HIS ATOMS DISSOLVE. FINALLY, THANOS DISAPPEARS. ACROSS THE FIELD, QUILL turns to GAMORA...BUT FINDS HER GONE.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: QUILL
SPEECH.LINE: Babe? Gamora? ACROSS THE FIELD...TONY STARK FALLS BACK AGAINST THE UPTURNED ROOTS OF A TREE, ARMOR SMOKING, ARM WITHERED AND BLACKENED. Dying. RHODEY RUSHES TO HIM, BUT WITH ONE LOOK, HE KNOWS IT’S TOO LATE. TONY EXHALES, ALMOST LETTING GO. Then... PETER PARKER lands, kneeling, taking Tony’s hand.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PETER PARKER
SPEECH.LINE: Mr. Stark...Tony...it’s okay, it’s okay...Mr. Stark, we won. You did it, sir... But Tony gazes past him. Rhodey puts his hand on Peter’s shoulder, guiding him away... AS PEPPER ARRIVES. She kneels, heartsick.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PEPPER POTTS
SPEECH.LINE: Hey, Friday, what’ve we got? FRIDAY (O.S.) Life functions critical. Pepper stares into her husband’s eyes...and knows. 134 (MORE) 135

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PEPPER POTTS
SPEECH.LINE: Tony, look at me. We’re going to be okay... He stares at her, tears welling. I’m sorry. She touches his face, then leans in to kiss him. PEPPER POTTS (CONT'D) You can rest now. When she pulls back, she sees his eyes, fixed and glassy. Everything goes quiet. All around, OUR HEROES GATHER, the full weight of what’s happened dawning on them. Tony Stark is gone. FADE TO BLACK.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CLINT BARTON
SPEECH.LINE: I just wish there were some way I could let her know that we won. That we did it.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: WANDA
SPEECH.LINE: She knows. They both do. Clint puts his arm around her. They stare out at the water.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: HAPPY HOGAN
SPEECH.LINE: How are you doing, squirt? You hungry?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MORGAN STARK
SPEECH.LINE: Uh, huh.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: HAPPY HOGAN
SPEECH.LINE: What do you want?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MORGAN STARK
SPEECH.LINE: Cheeseburgers? Happy takes a beat, choked up. Like father like daughter.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: HAPPY HOGAN
SPEECH.LINE: Did you know your dad liked cheeseburgers?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MORGAN STARK
SPEECH.LINE: No, I didn’t know that. 138 139

SPEECH.SPEAKER: HAPPY HOGAN
SPEECH.LINE: I’m going to get you all the cheeseburgers you want.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: VALKYRIE
SPEECH.LINE: So when can we expect you back?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: About that...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: VALKYRIE
SPEECH.LINE: Thor, your people need a king.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: They already have one. And she’s a far better king than I could ever be.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: VALKYRIE
SPEECH.LINE: Are you serious?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: It’s time to be who I am, rather than who I’m supposed to be. And a leader is who you are. She processes this. Does she want it? She does.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: VALKYRIE
SPEECH.LINE: You know, I’d make a lot of changes around here.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: I’m counting on it, Your Majesty. Emotional, Val finally SHAKES HIS HAND.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: VALKYRIE
SPEECH.LINE: What will you do?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: I’m not entirely sure. For the first time in a thousand years, I have no path. (beat) But I do have a ride. REVEAL...THE BENATAR parked behind them, Rocket alongside. 139 140

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROCKET
SPEECH.LINE: Move it or lose it, Hairbag.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Home sweet home. Tree! Good to see you. The Asgardians of the Galaxy, together again. He settles beside Quill, who holomaps their course. THOR (CONT'D) All right, where first? He swipes through images on the screen.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: QUILL
SPEECH.LINE: You know, I’m still in charge, here, right?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Of course. Of course... Thor swipes the map again.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: QUILL
SPEECH.LINE: See, when you keep swiping my map, that sounds kind of like, “of course, I know you think you’re still in charge-”

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: Quail, that’s your own insecurities bubbling up.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: DRAX
SPEECH.LINE: You should fight one another for the honor of leadership.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: NEBULA
SPEECH.LINE: Sounds fair.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: QUILL
SPEECH.LINE: That’s not necessary...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROCKET
SPEECH.LINE: I’ve got some blasters right here. Unless you want to use knives. 140 141

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MANTIS
SPEECH.LINE: Oh, yes, please, use knives-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: QUILL
SPEECH.LINE: No one’s using knives!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: GROOT
SPEECH.LINE: I am Groot! Quill and Thor exchange nervous laughter.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THOR
SPEECH.LINE: There’ll be no knifing young Quail today. Everyone knows who’s in charge. A long awkward moment passes.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: QUILL
SPEECH.LINE: Me. (sotto, to Thor) Right? Thor just smiles...

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: Remember, you’ll have to return the stones to the exact moment they were taken. Otherwise, we’re still looking at a whole bunch of nasty alternate realities.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Got it. I’ll clip all the branches. 141 142 Steve takes the case.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: You know, I tried. When I had the gauntlet. I really tried to bring her back. (beat) I miss her.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Me, too.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: You’d better get going. We’re almost ready for you. Steve and Sam approach the platform.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SAM WILSON
SPEECH.LINE: You look a little nervous going by yourself. Ask nicely, I’ll go with you.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: You’re a good man, Sam. But this one’s on me. When Steve reaches the platform, BUCKY stops him, pointed. STEVE (CONT'D) Don’t do anything stupid ‘til I get back, okay?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BUCKY BARNES
SPEECH.LINE: How can I? You’re taking all the stupid with you. Steve grins. Bucky gives him a long hug. BUCKY BARNES (CONT'D) Gonna miss you, buddy.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: It’s going to be okay, Buck. Steve picks up Mjolnir and takes his place on the platform. SAM LOOKS TO SMART HULK AT THE CONSOLE.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SAM WILSON
SPEECH.LINE: How long’s this gonna take? 142 143

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: For him, as long as he needs. For us, five seconds. (calling out) Ready, Cap? You’re good to go. Meet you right back here, okay? Steve glances at Bucky as he answers.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: You bet.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: Going Quantum in three, two, one. STEVE TAPS HIS CUFF AND SHRINKS TO NOTHING. SMART HULK (CONT'D) Aaand, returning in five... four...three...two...one- Silence. Nothing happens.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SAM WILSON
SPEECH.LINE: Where is he?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: I don’t know. He blew past our time stamp. He should be here.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SAM WILSON
SPEECH.LINE: Get him back!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: I’m trying.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SAM WILSON
SPEECH.LINE: Get him the hell back-

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SMART HULK
SPEECH.LINE: I’M TRYING! Just then...Bucky looks out to the water.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BUCKY BARNES
SPEECH.LINE: Sam. Sam turns... EXT AVENGERS COMPOUND, RIVERBANK - CONTINUOUS Work crews have cleared a space overlooking the river. There, AN OLD MAN sits on a bench, staring out at the Hudson. 143 144 Move around him to find SAM watching from A FEW YARDS AWAY.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SAM WILSON
SPEECH.LINE: Hey, Cap. The man turns and we now see: STEVE ROGERS, age 112.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: OLD STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Hi, Sam.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SAM WILSON
SPEECH.LINE: Something go wrong...or something go right?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: OLD STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: I thought, after everything that’s happened...maybe I should try out some of that life Tony always told me to get.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SAM WILSON
SPEECH.LINE: How was it? Steve looks at the river, 112 years of emotion in his face.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: OLD STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: It was beautiful.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SAM WILSON
SPEECH.LINE: I’m happy for you. Really.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: OLD STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Thanks.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SAM WILSON
SPEECH.LINE: Only thing bumming me out is now I live in a world without Captain America. Steve pulls up A CASE from beside him, giving it to Sam.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: OLD STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: That’s kind of why I’m here. Sam unzips it, revealing...A BRAND NEW SHIELD.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SAM WILSON
SPEECH.LINE: Where did you even get this?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: OLD STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: I had a little time to travel. (beat) Try it on. 144 145 Sam hesitates. He glances back at Bucky, who nods. Then Sam picks up the shield...and puts it on. OLD STEVE (CONT'D) How does it feel?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SAM WILSON
SPEECH.LINE: Like it’s someone else’s.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: OLD STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: It isn’t. Sam tries to check his emotion. He shakes Steve’s hand.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SAM WILSON
SPEECH.LINE: Thank you. I’ll try my best. Steve rests his other hand on Sam’s.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: OLD STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: That’s why it’s yours. Sam smiles, noticing...STEVE’S TARNISHED WEDDING RING.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: SAM WILSON
SPEECH.LINE: You gonna tell me about her? Steve smiles to himself at the end of a long, long life.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: OLD STEVE
SPEECH.LINE: Nope. I don’t think I will. CUE MUSIC: “IT’S BEEN A LONG, LONG TIME,” HARRY JAMES.
